Job Title: Appointment Setter (Commission-Based) for Digital Marketing Agency
Description:
Job Overview:
Our digital marketing agency is looking for two appointment setters to join our team on a commission-based basis. As an appointment setter, you will be responsible for reaching out to potential clients, introducing our services, and scheduling appointments for our sales team.

Job Responsibilities:
• Reach out to potential clients via phone, email, or social media to introduce our services and schedule appointments for our sales team.
• Maintain a strong understanding of our agency's services, products, and pricing to effectively communicate with potential clients.
• Conduct market research to identify potential clients and their needs.
• Follow up with potential clients to maintain relationships and increase the likelihood of closing deals.
• Update the agency's database with accurate and detailed information about potential clients.
• Collaborate with the sales team to ensure appointments are scheduled efficiently and effectively.

Requirements:
• Previous experience in appointment setting, telemarketing, or sales.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Strong organizational and time management skills.
• Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
• Familiarity with CRM software and data entry.
• Self-motivated and driven to achieve targets.
• Familiarity with digital marketing concepts and services is a plus.

Compensation:
This is a commission-based position. You will receive a percentage of the sales that result from the appointments you schedule. The commission rate will be discussed during the interview process.

If you are a motivated and driven individual who thrives in a fast-paced environment, and you have experience in appointment setting or sales, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity to be a part of our digital marketing agency.

Your job roles would cover: 

Off-page SEO Specialist: An Off-page SEO specialist would be responsible for identifying opportunities to build backlinks, managing social media accounts, and optimizing Google My Business listings. They would also work to ensure that the business's online presence is consistent across various platforms.

Reputation Manager: A reputation manager would be responsible for monitoring the business's online reputation and responding to any negative reviews or feedback. They would work to build and maintain a positive online presence for the business through the creation of high-quality content, positive reviews, and engagement with customers.

Advertising Specialist: An advertising specialist would be responsible for creating and managing advertising campaigns across various platforms, such as Google AdWords, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads. They would work to optimize campaigns to ensure that they are reaching the business's target audience and achieving desired results.

Digital Marketing Manager: A digital marketing manager would oversee the various aspects of the business's online marketing efforts, including Off-page SEO, reputation management, and full advertising. They would work to develop a comprehensive marketing strategy that aligns with the business's goals and budget.

Content Marketing Specialist: A content marketing specialist would be responsible for creating and managing the business's content marketing efforts, including blog posts, social media content, and email marketing campaigns. They would work to create high-quality content that engages customers and builds the business's brand.

Your monthly pay of $400 increases with additional value you provide and our relationship gets better and gets sustained over time.

Job Title: Social Media Pro to write and post on specific socials to increase organic growth
Description:
We are a fast-growing travel agency looking for a freelance social media manager to help us grow our organic traffic on our social media platforms. We're seeking an independent, self-starting, and collaborative freelancer to join our team and work remotely.

Responsibilities:

* Develop and execute social media strategies to increase brand awareness and drive engagement on all major social media platforms, including but not limited to Facebook and Instagram.
* Create engaging content, including copywriting, graphics, and videos, that resonates with our target audience
*Manage and curate content calendars for each social media platform, including scheduling
*Analyze social media performance metrics and adjust strategies accordingly
*Stay up-to-date with social media trends, algorithm changes, and best practices

Qualifications:

* Proven work experience as a social media manager or similar role
* Excellent writing, editing, and communication skills
* Strong understanding of social media platforms, tools, and metrics
* Ability to manage multiple social media accounts and projects simultaneously
* Creative thinker with a keen eye for design and aesthetics

Job Title: Looking to hire a Social Media manager for US CPA firm
Description:
Our Global team is on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional results where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours! Does this sound like you? Don't let this opportunity pass you by! Learn more below!

About the company
Tax Goddess (https://taxgoddess.com )
Solid, growing, and lively/fun Scottsdale CPA firm. We have been in the business for over 19 years, and we are ranked Top 1% of Tax Strategists in the USA. We are a progressive, computer-savvy CPA Firm, so you must have computer skills. Knowledge of working in the "cloud" is a plus as our firm is 100% digital.

Our search is for:
Someone who is detail-oriented, flexible, and motivated. You are the right fit if you have a proven ability to adapt and manage effectively in a fast-paced, challenging environment and manage multiple, oftentimes competing priorities. A person who invests deeply in their work and is curious and eager to learn. Communication skills, both written and verbal, as well as active listening abilities, must be exceptional.

Job Overview:

We are searching for a talented social media manager to represent our company by building a social media presence for our brands. The social media manager will be required to run advertising campaigns and drive engagement by creating high-quality original content. You should also engage influencers, manage our community by responding to comments, and oversee our customer service across all platforms.

Major tasks, responsibilities, and key accountabilities:

Performing research on current benchmark trends and audience preferences
Designing and implementing social media strategy to align with business goals
Setting specific objectives and reporting on ROI
Generate, edit, publish and share engaging content daily (e.g. original text, photos, videos and news)
Monitor SEO and web traffic metrics
Collaborate with other teams, like marketing, sales and customer service to ensure brand consistency.
Communicate with followers, respond to queries in a timely manner and monitor customer reviews
Oversee social media accounts’ design (e.g. Facebook timeline cover, profile pictures, and blog layout)
Suggest and implement new features to develop brand awareness, like promotions and competitions.
Stay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools, and applications.

Required Qualifications:
3 years of proven experience as a Social Media Manager
Hands on experience in content management
Ability to deliver creative content (text, image and video)
Solid knowledge of SEO, keyword research and Google Analytics
Knowledge of online marketing channels
Experience developing social media strategies.
Experience working with and developing a marketing plan.
Ability to develop the right voice for each social media platform.
Proven ability to build social media communities.
Understanding of graphic design principles.
Experience as a Brand Manager on social media.
Ability to measure the success of campaigns.

Working Hours: 
Our US business hours MANDATORY overlap is ( 8:00 am to 12:00 noon Arizona time, the rest of the hours can be flexible)
Hours for some departments may vary depending on the tasks/projects involved.
Billable teams ( Bookkeepers, Tax preparers, Customer care, and admins ) expect to work at least 50 hours per week during tax season, and weekends could be required. 
We need someone who is available for on-call emergencies (outside of normal working hours Only when needed).

If you can confidently demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible. Ensure you put “super-badass-enthusiastic Social Media Manager” in your title/cover letter/email submission, or your submission will be ignored.

Job Title: UGC Paid Advertising Video Editor for DTC Ecommerce Brands
Description:
We are an Ecommerce Marketing Agency, that helps DTC Ecommerce brands scale through high performance UGC ad creatives and paid advertising. 

We only work with established Ecommerce brands and we are looking for an experienced, passionate and highly driven video editor to join our team. 

We are looking for someone that is able to think out of the box and can bring great energy to the team. 

Job requirements:

You are very experienced and enjoy video editing, especially editing social media paid ads. At the same time, you are very familiar with the structure of UGC Ads and know the important elements behind a converting ad creative. 

- 2+ Years experience as a Video Editor, with a portfolio of relevant work

- Must have experience with DTC Ecommerce/Dropshipping Brands

- Strong copywriting/communication skills

- Great knowledge of Social Media (Mainly for Facebook Ads & TikTok Ads)

- You think very creatively and are data driven in execution

- Excellent team player


Job Scope and Expectations 

- You cut short, engaging social media ads that fit perfectly into the Instagram & Tiktok feed and leave a strong impression on the audience while also converting them into new customers. You understand the cliché saying that "Ads should not look like ads". 

- You receive UGC content (User Generated Content) from creators, cut a wide array of ads that sell! Since we are aggressive with testing, you cut at least 20 ads a week.

- You support the conception of the creatives briefs and strategy with creative input, but you are not afraid to analyze the performance data of our creatives. You will receive guidance and be working closely with our performance marketer on the paid advertising campaigns.

- You are constantly on the lookout for existing trends that work very well now and new and upcoming trends on Instagram and Tiktok and browse through the advertising libraries of other interesting brands for your daily dose of creative intake!

What you’ll Experience working with us:

- Fully remote work
- You are a valued Team Member, not an “employee”
- Daily team communication, efficient workflows, systems and processes
- Huge potential to grow into a full time video editing as our agency is rapidly growing

Remuneration: $450 USD/client/month

About us:
We are a global product sourcing company founded in 2005 to provide sustainable sourcing and procurement services. Over the years we have accumulated knowledge of wealth when it comes to providence of product sourcing services. We have managed to expand our product sourcing activities across Asia, Europe, Africa and America which means we are able cover all important emerging markets and to closely integrate with both our clients and their supply markets.


We want someone to help us with  cooperation with other pages (review pages, shopping guide pages, lifestyle bloggers)

We are in need of someone that serves to be our partnership manager, the person should be the one to arrange for interviews, guest blog posts, webinars, Co-Marketing  with our partners who offer complementary services for the same customers as ours. We will share about those partners and they, in best case, also share about us.

Job Title: Looking for a Valorant content editor who speaks Japanese
Description:
About Zealium Media Limited:

Zealium Media is a digital media owner and performance marketing business, focussed primarily on the esports and sports industries. Whilst we’re a young company, our founders have decades of experience marketing in highly competitive verticals online and we know what it takes to win.
One of Zealium’s primary esports assets is the leading Valorant stats and scores website – THESPIKE.GG.  THESPIKE.GG is seeing large growth in the Japanese market, and we are excited to look for a content manger to oversee this growth.
About the Role

The Valorant Content Editor - Japan at Zealium Media will be responsible for developing the content strategy for all local Japanese content on THESPIKE.GG.  Zealium have very high ambitions for the Japanese market and are looking for a passionate Valorant fan who can manage and create engaging content.

As with everything we build, we expect our esports asset to stand out from the competition and this role will be critical to innovating on how we merge esports data with world class copy and bespoke integrations, to create truly un-skippable content.
Responsibilities:
•	Develop the Japanese content strategy with a focus on maximum outreach and user engagement
•	Delivering quarterly, monthly and weekly content plans
•	Creation of feature Valorant articles and news
•	Commissioning and editing copy from industry contributors and freelance journalists.
•	Building relationships with relevant publishers to create distribution and outreach opportunities for your content.
•	Ensuring our Valorant news is amongst the first to release to market
•	Ideation for innovative data visualisations which set our content apart from the competition
•	Recommendation of features and product ideas to develop the functionality of the site
•	Maximise distribution of our content by outreaching to relevant publishers and content networks.

Required Skills & Experience:
You should be an Esports Journalist / Senior Esports Reporter / Multimedia Esports Reporter / Journalist / Copywriter / Digital Journalist or similar with a CV that demonstrates the following.
•	First and foremost you must be a huge Valorant fan! Your writing and editorial skills are very important, but unless you eat, breath and sleep Valorant then this role isn’t for you.
•	Must have worked within SEO requirements
•	Must be fluent in Japanese
•	Must be fluent in English
•	Ability to understand keyword research and use of keywords semantically within the articles written
•	Ability to deliver vibrant, absorbing, clean copy to tight deadlines
•	Ability to work self-sufficiently and generate fresh ideas for this web production role
•	A keen eye for photographs and use the best images and videos to help a story drive traffic
•	Must have solid news website experience
•	Must work productively within a team environment
•	Experience of working online and knowledge of SEO best practice, while understanding the role social media plays in selling and presenting content.
•	You are an active and motivated person.
•	Any experience with esports analysis is an advantage.
•	You are curious, outgoing, and like to solve problems.


















ゼイリアム・メディア・リミテッドについて
Zealium Mediaは、主にesportsとスポーツ業界に特化したデジタルメディアオーナーとパフォーマンスマーケティング企業です。私たちは若い会社ですが、創業者たちは、競争の激しい分野でのマーケティングに数十年の経験を持ち、勝つために何が必要かを知っています。
Zealiumの主要なesports資産の1つは、Valorantの統計・スコアサイトであるTHESPIKE.GGです。 THESPIKE.GGは日本市場で大きな成長を遂げており、この成長を監督するコンテンツマネージャーを募集しています。
役割について
Zealium MediaのValorant Content Editor - Japanは、THESPIKE.GGのすべてのローカル日本コンテンツのコンテンツ戦略を開発する責任を負います。 Zealiumは日本市場に対して非常に高い志を持っており、魅力的なコンテンツを管理・作成できる熱狂的なValorantファンを求めています。
この役割は、esportsのデータとワールドクラスのコピーや特注のインテグレーションを融合させ、スキップできないコンテンツを作成する革新的な方法として重要です。
職務内容
- 最大限のアウトリーチとユーザーエンゲージメントに焦点を当てた、日本のコンテンツ戦略の開発
- 四半期、月間、週間のコンテンツプランの提供
- Valorantの特集記事・ニュースの作成
- 業界関係者やフリーランスのジャーナリストから原稿を依頼し、編集する。
- 関連出版社との関係を構築し、コンテンツの配信やアウトリーチの機会を創出します。
- ヴァロラントのニュースをいち早く市場に発信する。
- 競合他社とは一線を画す革新的なデータビジュアライゼーションのアイデア出し
- サイトの機能を発展させるための機能・商品アイデアの提案
- 関連する出版社やコンテンツネットワークへの働きかけにより、当社コンテンツの配信を最大化する。

必要なスキル・経験
Esports Journalist / Senior Esports Reporter / Multimedia Esports Reporter / Journalist / Copywriter / Digital Journalist、またはそれに類する方で、以下のことを証明できる履歴書をお持ちの方を希望します。
- まず第一に、Valorantの大ファンであること。ライティングや編集のスキルは非常に重要ですが、Valorantを食べ、呼吸し、眠ることができなければ、この役割はあなたには向いていません。
- SEO対策に携わったことがある方
- 日本語が堪能であること
- 英語に堪能であること
- キーワード調査を理解し、執筆した記事内でキーワードを意味的に使用することができる。
- 活気に満ちた、吸収力のある、クリーンなコピーをタイトな納期で提供する能力
- ウェブ制作という仕事柄、自立して新鮮なアイデアを生み出すことができる。
- 写真に対する鋭い目を持っており、ストーリーがトラフィックを促進するために最適な画像や動画を使用すること
- しっかりとしたニュースサイトの経験があること
- チーム環境の中で生産的に働くことができること
- オンラインでの作業経験とSEOのベストプラクティスの知識を持ち、同時にコンテンツの販売やプレゼンテーションにおいてソーシャルメディアが果たす役割を理解している方。
- アクティブでやる気のある方。
- esportsの分析経験があれば、なお可。
- 好奇心旺盛で、外向的で、問題を解決するのが好きな方。

Job Title: Experienced Facebook Ads Media Buyer For Real Estate Agents
Description:
We run a specialized marketing agency in Spain called Actio Real Estate helping spanish Real Estate Agents to get more leads, appointments and clients with Facebook Ads. While most other agencies do everything for everybody we decided to focus just on one thing to have that competitive adavntage and also to make it easier for us to deliver results as our clients are very similar to each other.

About the Job:

We’re looking for an experienced Facebook Ads manager to work with us and deliver amazing results to our clients.  As our Facebook ads manager you will work with us on per client basis and be responsible for the following tasks:

*Setting up and launching Facebook campaigns
*Setting up retargeting pixels, custom conversions etc.
*Daily management of Facebook campaigns once they go live

Requirements:

As the title says, we’re looking for an experienced Facebook ads manager for Real Estate Agents and this doesn’t mean anybody…  You must satisfy all of the following requirements to be considered for this job:

*Experience setting up, launching and managing effective Facebook campaigns for Real Estate Agents
*Proven track record that you’re able to prove 
*Knowledge of landing pages, funnels, conversions, testing etc. 
*Ability to check on client campaigns and report results daily.  
*Since clients will be from Spain and their campaigns will be run in spanish, speaking spanish will be a well-considered skill for this position and having experience running campaigns specifically for spanish Real Estate Agents will put you above other applicants, so if you have that experience let us know.

How to apply:

To apply for this job please send over a brief 1-2 minute loom video about why you believe this job is for you.  Please confirm that you meet all the requirements and send as much proof as possible to back it up.  Finally, why should we hire you over all the other applicants?

Skills required,

1. The ability to carry on a conversation and reveal needs, wants and problems.
2. The ability to spot problems.
3. The ability to give the right solution to the right problem.

Years of experience,

- Any.

About us.

Adarsh Copywriting is a Converson-Rate-Optimization company.

We help SaaS business under $10M ARR to get on the fast lane of growth so they can flaunt it.

What would you do?

1. Build lists of prospects.

2. Reach out to those prospects and point a problem (reach out through email/phone/LinkedIn based on the sales cadence).

3. Provide the right solution to that problem (show how you can help them).

4. Provide a call-to-action.

Salary and compensation,

1. You are paid hourly through Upwork.
2. You get 10% of the revenue you generate (our deal sizes are from $5000-$50000).

Apply if you love to provide value.

Job Title: PPC campaign audit and optimisation for a US based law firm
Description:
Job Summary:
We are seeking a PPC Campaign Specialist to join our team of legal professionals. In this role, you will be responsible for auditing, optimizing, and managing our law firm's PPC campaigns to increase lead generation and drive traffic to our website. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of PPC advertising, with experience in developing and executing successful campaigns for law firms or similar professional services.

Responsibilities:

Conducting regular audits of our law firm's PPC campaigns to identify areas for improvement and optimize performance.
Developing and executing new PPC campaigns to target specific practice areas and geographic locations.
Conducting keyword research and analysis to identify relevant and high-converting search terms for our campaigns.
Managing and optimizing ad copy and landing pages to ensure high click-through and conversion rates.
Monitoring and analyzing campaign performance metrics to identify trends and areas for improvement.
Collaborating with our marketing team to align PPC campaigns with broader marketing strategies and initiatives.
Keeping up-to-date with industry trends and best practices to ensure our campaigns are competitive and effective.
Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field.
3+ years of experience in PPC advertising, preferably in a professional services or legal industry.
Proven track record of developing and executing successful PPC campaigns with a strong ROI.
Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with team members and stakeholders.
Experience with Google Ads and other PPC platforms, as well as Google Analytics and other web analytics tools.
Strong understanding of SEO and how it relates to PPC campaigns.
Experience with A/B testing and other optimization techniques.
Familiarity with legal industry terminology and practices is a plus.
If you are a results-driven PPC Campaign Specialist with a passion for optimizing campaigns and driving business growth, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity to join our team of legal professionals.

Internet marketing and google SEO. Knowledge of SEO in India and China too.

We are keen to hear from candidates who are passionate about digital media and want to develop their experience delivering and analysing digital marketing campaigns. More specifically experience and interest in Facebook / Meta as an advertising channel.

SKILLS AND ATTRIBUTES:
- You are passionate about digital marketing
- You have an eye for creative content
- You have hands-on experience with Facebook Ads, Social Media Marketing and tiktok 
- You write with passion and excitement
- You are always learning and keep up to date with trends
- You learn quickly and adapt
- You possess a high degree of self-motivation and will see projects through to successful completion
- You challenge yourself
- You are known as the “organised one”
- You pay attention to the detail
- You always follow through
- Being part of a team suits you
- You possess a growth mindset
- You have relevant training and qualifications

MAIN PURPOSE AND SCOPE OF THE JOB:
To deliver successful and profitable Facebook Ad campaigns and communications for the broader projects.

HOURS: 40 / Week
PAY: £1200 paid monthly + bonus (based on account performance)

DUTIES AND KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Create engaging content and ‘story telling’ for Financial service based clients.
- Developing and implementing digital marketing strategies, including testing new creatives and scaling accounts with proven data
- Creating, executing, and monitoring marketing campaign budgets
- Measuring key performance metrics, including website traffic, audience engagement, and all other relevant data
- Preparing reports on the performance of marketing campaigns
- Using advanced analytics software to identify customer touchpoints and assess end-to-end customer experience across diverse digital channels.

You’ll love being on the Leadly Team because:

ASO/SEO Specialist

You will be working on App Store Optimization (ASO) of multiple apps and website optimization (SEO) related to software for privacy, technology and crypto. 
You will be managing ASO/SEO with the main objective of maximizing app store traffic and conversion rate, and gaining organic visitors to website (SEO). 


About the role
Your responsibilities will include:
•	ASO strategies: Develop, manage and execute best in-class ASO strategies across the App Store (Apple) and Google Play Store (Android) 
•	SEO strategies: Develop, manage and execute best in-class SEO strategies for desktop browser.

•	Organic growth strategies: Work closely with UA on identifying, planning, executing and measuring opportunities to stimulate our organic growth in an ROI positive manner.
•	Benchmarking: Develop a deep knowledge of the technology space for the products and the various competitors in the space, analyzing the strengths and weaknesses of the competitor products, as well as identifying potential opportunities to share with the internal teams.
•	Identify and Implement Opportunities: Consistently stay in touch with news, trends, chat groups so that ASO can be implemented real-time based upon current and breaking events. 

About you
•	Communication Expertise: Strong communication skills to be able to interact efficiently with stakeholders, marketing teammates and developers
•	Data Driven Digital Marketing Experience: ASO/SEO knowledge required, preferably in technology software. You are comfortable putting on the headphones and rocking out while you research and implement keyword strategies for hours. 
•	A passion for Technology & Apps Marketing: A deep understanding of digital marketing, technology, and blockchain industry
•	User Lifecycle: Knowledge and understanding of the user lifecycle from discoverability/awareness, click, install, on-boarding, engagement, monetization, loyalty and evangelism.
•	Open Minded and Innovative: Be comfortable collecting information and feedback from across the business, come up with or identify innovative ideas, and convert thoughts into actions in a structured manner.
•	Organized: You are highly organized and can focus on several projects at once
•	Remote: You are comfortable working remotely

Job Title: Strategic Content Creation - Analyze, Research and Plan Content
Description:
We are looking for a dedicated person with knowledge and experience in SEO, particularly the creation of content briefs (table of contents). There will be a constant supply of work. The

***Receive a targeted topic + some main competitors to create a content brief for (we use surferseo. The content briefs will be uploaded there)

***Create the content brief from scratch

***When you are ready, your content brief will be checked

******Some crucial skills include:

1. A basic understanding of semantics: how do search engines understand and process human-written text.

2. Understand the purpose of a pillar and a cluster page for a particular topic and how they develop topical authority.

3. Understand which is the main context and content angle for a particular topic and which supplementary subtopics can be included.

4. Understand how to use and connect topics and subtopics in a cluster of articles. For example, where to place an internal link in a particular article to another article from the same semantic cluster.

5. Analyze search engine results pages and understand why a particular article might rank higher than competitors. This is closely related to quality thresholds and information gain scores.

- Each niche, even query, can have certain quality thresholds related to a particular context, content format and questions answered, for example.

- This is a crucial skill to have and understand what is the main topic of an article and what subheadings and questions should be included to fully cover it and satisfy humans and search engines' algorithms. In other words, what are the subheadings and topics to include in the content brief so the

- Additionally, you should be able to distinguish main topics/subtopics from secondary(supplementary) ones.

1. Be able to work with mind maps that represent website taxonomies and informational structure.

2. Know how to write search engine-friendly (+voice search) subheadings.

***When applying please answer the following questions:

1, What should an SEO content brief include?

- you can include each point on a new line

2. What do you think is the single most important factor to consider when creating a content brief?

3. How should a subheading be structured/written so search engines can understand it and be voice-search friendly. Provide an example.

4. What do you understand by main topic and context?

5. What do you understand by secondary (supplementary) topics?

5. Imagine you need to create a content brief for Winter motorhoming / Using a motorhome in the winter. Divide the subtopics/questions below into 2 groups: Main ones and supplementary

- How To Store Your Motorhome In The Winter?

- What are the advantages of winter motorhoming?

- How to winterize your motorhome?

- Can A Motorhome Be Used In The Winter?

- How to keep a motorhome warm in the winter?

- How to drive a motorhome in the snow?

- Can You Live In A Motorhome In The Winter?

### Now do the same for "what is concrete":

- What are the different types of concrete?

- What is concrete

- What are the different applications of concrete

- How long does concrete last

- What are the benefits of using concrete

- Constituents of Concrete

- Is Concrete Environmentally Friendly?

- How Durable is concrete?

#1 How did you decide which are the main and which are the supplementary topics?

#2 What is your experience in the creation of content briefs for SEO purposes?

#3 Do you have any favorite sources where you learn SEO and semantics?

#4 Are you familiar with the concepts of topical authority and informational gain score? If so, please, explain how you understand each one.

#5 How many hours can you devote per week?

1. optimizing copy and landing pages for search engine optimization 2. Perform ongoing keyword discovery, expansion and optimization 3. Efficiently Manage a caseload of investigations 4. Deindexing of links from google search 5. Researching and implementing content recommendations for organic SEO success 6. Crawl accessibility so search engines can deindex your website 7. Develop and implement link building strategy

Job Title: Hiring an Amazon Marketing Team, including Image Editing, Video Production, and Listing Writing
Description:
We are an Amazon seller based in China, specializing in smart lock products with a target market in the US. We are currently seeking a professional Amazon marketing and packaging team, including image editing, video production, and listing writing, to enhance our brand awareness and sales in the US market.

Job Requirements:

Possess extensive Amazon marketing experience and be able to develop suitable marketing strategies and plans based on the target market and customer needs.

Have professional skills in image editing, video production, and listing writing, and be able to independently create high-quality marketing materials.

Have innovative thinking and team collaboration skills, and be able to work closely with our team to provide marketing solutions that meet our brand positioning and target market demands.

Job Details:

Image Editing: Responsible for creating high-quality images for our Amazon products, including product images, white background images, and scene images, etc. The candidate must be familiar with Amazon's image requirements and layout, able to independently complete image editing and design.

Video Production: Responsible for creating attractive promotional videos for our Amazon products. The candidate must have professional skills in video shooting and editing, able to independently complete video production and coordinate with our team.

Listing Writing: Responsible for writing Amazon listing descriptions that meet Amazon's standards and customer needs, accurately expressing the features and advantages of our products, and attracting potential customers to purchase.

Compensation:

We offer competitive compensation, and specific compensation will be negotiated based on the candidate's experience and expertise. We are looking for professionals who are willing to join our team and work together to promote our product sales and brand development in the Amazon market.

If you have the relevant professional skills and extensive Amazon marketing experience, and are willing to join our team, please send your resume and portfolio to us through the Upwork platform. We look forward to working with you!

Hi,

I need to build a high-quality sales automation process. 

I've built an online analysis tool that creates an interactive report and dashboard for managers on how their team works and functions. It's all about generating insights and actions to increase team cohesion and morale while reducing stress - the end game is to boost team performance and productivity.

www.teamlytica.com

My main product is the Team report but I have other things to promote:
- Demo session - free
- Accreditation workshop - paid
- Team development day workshop - paid
- Team360 report - paid
- Benchmark report - paid

I need:
- Funnel pages - to find affiliates and for them to promote to their customers
- Email sequencing
- Diary booking
- Payments
- CRM
- Linking to Linkedin, my diary and email etc
- Potential for other free or paid downloads
- Affiliate management - their own landing pages, payments, bookings etc 

I'm sure there is a lot I've missed - and your experience and expertise need to fill in all the blanks 


Step 1. 
I need you to recommend which platform would suit me best. I'm happy to jump on a call and discuss my needs in more detail. GoHighLevel, Systeme.io, and Kartra are front runners but happy to look at others.

Step2. 
Map out the entire process. 

Step 3.
Build the system - phased is OK as I won't need everything all at once.
I'll provide the main copy but happy for you to add your experience in what works

Step 4.
Test and improve - this might lead to ongoing work

Notes:

I have a funnel page and some email sequences already set up in Kartra which can be used for reference. Kartra is not my preferred choice but I can be convinced.

I have lots of collateral, images, colors, logos, etc which should make the job much easier.

I'm after proactivity at every stage.

Keeping it simple will save time and money and allow further development going forward

Timescales:
I would look to start building around the 10th of April
It would be good to have it completed within 4 weeks - not a deal breaker though as long as progress is being made

Please do not call me directly as I like to place all work through Upwork.

I'm looking forward to doing great work with you.

Mark

All of your job roles are listed below:

Sales closing: Managing the sales process from initial contact to contract signing, including preparing proposals and presentations, negotiating terms, and closing deals.

Lead generation: Developing and implementing lead generation strategies to attract potential customers and increase the company's customer base.

Customer support: Providing timely and effective support to customers to ensure their satisfaction with the company's services, including responding to inquiries, resolving issues, and providing ongoing assistance.

Relationship management: Building and maintaining strong relationships with customers, understanding their needs and preferences, and developing customized solutions to meet their requirements.

Data analysis: Analyzing customer data to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for improvement in the sales and customer support processes.

Communication: Communicating with customers and internal stakeholders to ensure everyone is aligned on goals, timelines, and expectations.

Reporting: Generating regular reports on sales performance, lead generation metrics, and customer satisfaction to inform decision-making and drive continuous improvement.

Training and development: Providing training and development opportunities to team members to enhance their skills and knowledge in sales closing, lead generation, and customer support.

FLUENT ENGLISH IS REQUIRED

-----
Creativity exists in us all. But sometimes it needs setting alight. We spark creativity by inspiring our customers and collaborators to express themselves. We create distinctive and relevant interior lifestyle pieces that help people find their creative character. So they can add their touch to any space and share their personality with the world. We seek a motivated Sales Development Representative to join our rapidly growing Sales team and be responsible for driving the top of the sales funnel with high-quality, new business opportunities.

Job Title: Marketing Manager with Expertise in HubSpot
Description:
We are searching for a highly qualified Marketing Manager who can contribute to existing programs while assisting with development of new initiatives aligned with company and client goals. The ideal candidate will have experience in a wide range of marketing functions, including communications, advertising, branding, digital, and social media. The Marketing Manager must be an organized multitasker, able to handle many diverse projects simultaneously and meet deadlines and KPIs.

About the Position:
If you live and breathe marketing, we need to talk. We’re looking for an experienced, qualified, and versatile marketer who will be responsible for the growth of our inbound sales channels. To be successful in this role, you should have extensive hands-on experience with a variety of online and offline Marketing areas – from web analytics tools, to PR and Social Media, to turning creative ideas into effective advertising projects and tracking results while delivering on KPIs.

Ultimately, you will help us maintain and further develop our strong and consistent brand through a wide range of online and offline marketing channels with the support of our professional Marketing Team. You will head, organize, and manage campaigns, projects, and activities in:
-	Website performance & optimization
-	Social Media Marketing
-	PR & Media Relations
-	Content Marketing
-	Marketing Collateral
-	Email Marketing
-	Newsletters
-	Internal and External Communications
-	Online & Offline Advertising Campaigns
-	And more

Objectives of the Role
•	Oversee and guide implementation of company’s brand strategy
•	Ensure that all marketing efforts serve immediate and long-term business goals by identifying and executing improvements for processes, content, and lead generation
•	Lead the execution of marketing programs from start to finish, leveraging internal support and driving collaboration
•	Analyze customer insights, consumer trends, competition, and marketing best practices to build successful strategies
•	Create, maintain, and conduct analytics reporting across multiple platforms and extract key insights for future campaign development and go-to-market strategies, complete with formal proposals and recommendations on tactics
•	Partner with email, Social Media, and web teams to design, test, and evolve lead nurture tactics.

Responsibilities
•	Establish marketing goals based on past performance and market forecasts 
•	Develop strategies and tactics to get the word out about our company and drive qualified traffic to our front door
•	Deploy successful marketing campaigns and own their implementation from ideation to execution
•	Communicate campaign objectives, timelines, and deliverables to Marketing Team, and provide instructions and guidance
•	Experiment with a variety of organic and paid acquisition channels like content creation, content curation, pay per click campaigns, event management, publicity, social media, lead generation campaigns, copywriting, performance analysis
•	Oversee and manage the production of valuable and engaging content for our websites and blogs that attracts and converts our target groups
•	Communicate and build strategic relationships with key industry players, various media buyers, advertising agencies, vendors, printers, and other services to help marketing projects come to fruition
•	Plan meetings, events, conferences, and trade shows by identifying requirements, establishing contacts, developing schedules and assignments, and coordinating mailing lists
•	Monitor the marketing budget on a quarterly and annual basis and allocate funds wisely
•	Maintain inventory of sales support materials, ensuring all are current and accurate, and coordinate the creation of new materials when necessary
•	Oversee and approve marketing material, from website banners to hard copy brochures and case studies
•	Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, gain insight and assess against goals and KPIs
•	Track all marketing data and create detailed written reports and verbal presentations to bring to Executive Leadership Team
•	Analyze consumer behavior and adjust email and advertising campaigns accordingly

Skills and Qualifications
•	Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business, or related field
•	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
•	5+ years of proven experience in marketing coordination or similar role
•	Strong project management, multitasking, and decision-making skills
•	Strong grip of marketing automation, CMS, and CRM tools
•	Proven experience with HubSpot
•	Metrics-driven marketing mind with eye for creativity
•	Proficiency with online marketing and social media strategy

Preferred Qualifications
•	Master’s degree a plus
•	Knowledge and experience with Project Management tools (ClickUp)
•	Willingness and ability to travel

About the role…

Job Title: US-Based Content Marketeer Wanted for Profit-Sharing Partnership with a Content Development Agency
Description:
We are a technology content development agency based in India with over 80% of our existing client base in the US. We specialize in creating high-quality, engaging content for technology companies, and we are looking to expand our reach in the US market. To do this, we are seeking a US-based content marketeer/business development professional to partner with us on a profit-sharing basis.

As our partner, you will be responsible for sourcing technology-related content work from the US market and passing it on to us for execution. You will be responsible for identifying potential clients, and negotiating project terms and timelines.

We will take care of the content creation process, working closely with you to ensure that we deliver high-quality content that meets our clients' needs. We will also handle all client communications, project management, and billing. Your role will be to act as a liaison between us and the clients, ensuring that projects run smoothly and that our clients are satisfied with the work.

We are looking for someone who has experience in content marketing, a good understanding of the technology industry, and a strong network of contacts in the US market. You should also have excellent communication and negotiation skills, be highly organized, and be able to work independently.

Payments will be based on a success fee, with a percentage of the total project cost being paid to you for each successful project that you bring to us. We are looking for a long-term partnership and are committed to ensuring that you receive a fair share of the profits generated from our joint efforts.

If you are interested in this partnership opportunity, please send us your resume and a brief cover letter explaining your experience and why you would be a good fit for this role. We look forward to hearing from you!

StartupGeek.com is a growing content platform dedicated to providing valuable insights, resources, and support to startup founders and entrepreneurs. We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality content to help our audience navigate the complex world of startups and foster their growth.

We are currently seeking a motivated and ambitious Junior SDR to join our team. If you have a passion for startups, excellent communication skills, and a drive to excel in a sales role, we'd love to hear from you.

Title: Junior SDR

Location: Remote

Position: Part time with flexible hours (except for a weekly meeting on Monday 9:00 am EST). We estimate 40-50 hours a month in the first 3 months and then growing steadily.

Responsibilities:

- Generate new leads by prospecting, cold calling, emailing, and networking to expand our client base.
- Identify and qualify potential customers, understanding their needs and how Startup Geek's offerings can benefit them.
- Develop and maintain a strong knowledge of our content offerings, pricing structures, and value propositions.
- Conduct presentations and product demonstrations to showcase the value of Startup Geek's platform to potential clients.
- Work collaboratively with the sales and marketing teams to develop sales strategies and drive revenue growth.
- Maintain accurate records of sales activities, including customer interactions, leads, opportunities, and closed deals in the CRM system.
- Consistently achieve and exceed monthly sales targets and key performance indicators (KPIs).
- Attend industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities to build relationships and promote Startup Geek's brand.
- Provide timely and constructive feedback to the management team regarding customer needs, market trends, and competitor activities.
- Participate in ongoing sales training and development to continuously improve your skills and stay up-to-date with industry best practices.

Requirements:

Supabaza Sdn. Bhd. - Freelance Sales Representative

Location: Johor Bahru, Malaysia
Duration: Weekly contract renewal
Start Date: As soon as possible

Supabaza Sdn. Bhd., a B2B tech startup based in Johor Bahru, is looking for Freelance Sales Representatives to help market and promote our business. Our tech platform simplifies the process of finding and transacting with F&B suppliers, for businesses such as restaurants and hotels.

Remuneration:

RM300 per week (if there are at least 15 new customer activations*)
RM20 per new customer activation*
(* A new customer activation is a new customer who has signed up for an account and requested for at least one quote via the account)

Weekly remuneration would be capped at RM1,500 per week (i.e. a maximum of 60 new customer signups would be considered per week).

Illustrative examples:-
Week 1: 10 new customer signups, total remuneration for the week = RM20 x 10 = RM200
Week 2: 15 new customer signups, total remuneration for the week = RM20 x 15 + RM300 = RM600
Week 3: 50 new customer signups, total remuneration for the week = RM20 x 50 + RM300 = RM1,300
Week 4: 70 new customer signups, total remuneration for the week = RM20 x 60 + RM300 = RM1,500

Responsibilities:

- Market the Supabaza platform to potential customers through various sales channels, such as phone, email, social media, and in-person visits
- Conduct cold calling and in-person visits to engage prospects, identifying their needs and matching them with our platform's features
- Develop and maintain a strong pipeline of potential clients, regularly updating the CRM to track progress
- Prepare and deliver presentations and demonstrations to prospects, showcasing the value of our platform and its benefits
- Provide feedback to the product and development team regarding customer needs, helping to shape future features and improvements

Come help us introduce businesses across Johor Bahru to a new way of F&B purchasing - We look forward to hearing from you!

Job Overview:
We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced SEO and Digital Ad Specialist to join our marketing team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving traffic to our website through effective SEO strategies and creating and managing successful digital ad campaigns. The successful candidate will be passionate about SEO, digital marketing, and have experience with various digital marketing channels, including social media, search engines, and display advertising.

Key Responsibilities:
• Developing and executing successful SEO strategies that drive organic traffic to the website
• Analyzing website performance using web analytics tools such as Google Analytics, SEMrush, or SimilarWeb
• Conducting keyword research and optimizing website content to improve search engine rankings
• Monitoring and analyzing competitors' SEO strategies and performance
• Creating and implementing successful digital ad campaigns across various channels, including search engines, social media, and display advertising
• Analyzing and optimizing campaigns to improve conversion rates and ROI
• Managing PPC campaigns and optimizing campaigns for maximum return on investment
• Managing social media advertising campaigns and optimizing campaigns for maximum reach and engagement
• Collaborating with other members of the marketing team to develop and execute integrated marketing campaigns
• Staying up-to-date with the latest SEO and digital advertising trends and techniques
• Generating reports and analyzing data to measure campaign success and identify areas for improvement

Required Skills and Experience:
• Bachelor's degree in marketing, advertising, or related field
• 3-5 years of experience in SEO and digital advertising
• Proven track record of successful SEO and digital advertising campaigns
• In-depth knowledge of search engine optimization best practices
• Experience with web analytics tools such as Google Analytics, SEMrush, or SimilarWeb
• Experience with PPC campaigns and social media advertising
• Strong analytical skills and the ability to use data to inform decisions
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Ability to work collaboratively with other members of the marketing team
• Strong project management skills and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office and Google Suite

Desired Skills and Experience:
• Experience with WordPress or other content management systems
• Experience with A/B testing and landing page optimization
• Experience with email marketing campaigns
• Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
• Google Ads certification or other digital marketing certifications

Work Environment:
The SEO and Digital Ad Specialist will work in a fast-paced environment and must be able to manage multiple projects simultaneously. The successful candidate will be able to work independently as well as collaboratively with other members of the marketing team. The position may require some evening and weekend work to meet project deadlines.

Conclusion:
The SEO and Digital Ad Specialist is an important role in our marketing team, responsible for driving traffic to our website through effective SEO strategies and creating and managing successful digital ad campaigns. The ideal candidate will be passionate about SEO and digital advertising, have experience with various digital marketing channels, and be able to work independently as well as collaboratively with other members of the marketing team. If you have the skills and experience we are looking for, we encourage you to apply.

Job Title: Creative Strategist for High Converting Meta & TikTok Ads (Multiple eCommerce Brands)
Description:
We are seeking a highly talented and innovative Creative Strategist with a deep understanding of consumer psychology to join our team and create engaging, high-converting ads for multiple e-commerce brands on Facebook and TikTok. In this role, you will be responsible for crafting compelling hooks, descriptions, images, and videos that effectively promote our clients' products and services while leveraging psychological principles to drive consumer behavior. The ideal candidate should have a strong track record of creating ads that drive sales, and an in-depth understanding of e-commerce, social media marketing, and consumer behavior.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and execute creative strategies for multiple e-commerce brands, with a focus on Facebook and TikTok ad campaigns, taking psychological principles into account to enhance ad effectiveness.
- Conceptualize and produce high-quality, attention-grabbing hooks, product descriptions, images, and videos that align with each brand's identity and marketing objectives while tapping into consumer psychology to drive engagement and conversions.
- Collaborate with marketing managers, copywriters, and designers to create engaging ad content that resonates with target audiences and leverages psychological insights.
- Analyze ad performance metrics and optimize creatives based on data-driven insights to maximize return on ad spend.
- Conduct thorough research on industry trends, competitors, customer preferences, and psychological factors that influence consumer behavior to inform creative decisions and ensure ads remain relevant and effective.
- Monitor and report on the effectiveness of campaigns and recommend adjustments to improve overall performance.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest developments in social media platforms, advertising tools, best practices, and psychological research to ensure our ad strategies are innovative and efficient.

Requirements:

- Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Advertising, Psychology, or a related field.
- Proven experience in creating high-converting ads for Facebook and TikTok, preferably within the e-commerce industry, with a focus on leveraging psychological principles.
- A strong portfolio showcasing your ability to create engaging ad content, including hooks, product descriptions, images, and videos, that demonstrates an understanding of consumer psychology.
- Expertise in social media advertising tools and analytics, such as Facebook Ads Manager and TikTok Ads.
- Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro) or similar design and video editing software.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.
- Strong analytical and critical thinking skills, with a keen eye for detail and a data-driven approach to decision-making.

To apply, please submit your resume, cover letter, and a link to your portfolio showcasing your relevant work. We look forward to reviewing your application and potentially working together to create engaging and high-converting ads that leverage psychological insights for our e-commerce clients.

Job Title: Facebook Ads Expert for Real Estate Agents

Job Title: Facebook Ads Expert for Real Estate Agents

Job Overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled Facebook Ads Expert to help real estate agents reach their target audience effectively through Facebook advertising. Job Objective:
* Our target goal is 1 new listing generated from the Facebook ad campaigns every month for EACH real estate agent.

Compensation:
If the target goal stated in the Job Objective is met the the compensation is as follows:

* $500/mo per agent, we’ll provide you with 10 agents, so total monthly payment would be $5,000.

IMPORTANT:
-There will be no payment if the goal of 1 new listing/month per agent is not met, as this is a PAY ON RESULTS Job.

-Must be able to speak English fluently/natively.
 
-Please attach past Facebook advertisement content you’ve used such as flyers.

If you have a passion for digital marketing and helping real estate agents succeed, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Job Title: Instagram Template Designer based on Company Guidelines
Description: We are seeking a talented Instagram Template Designer. As an Instagram Template Designer, you will be responsible for creating visually stunning and engaging 9 Instagram templates that align with our company's brand guidelines and marketing objectives.
I need a SEO EXPERT to Optimize my Website for certain Keywords. I need to fix On page Errors as well. It can be an Ongoing Opportunity for the Best Resource.

Qualifications:

PLEASE NOTICE: All of the conditions and characteristics listed below must be met in order for us to evaluate your application.

-Extremely ambitious individual

-2+ YEARS EXPERIENCE WITH FACEBOOK ADVERTISING (no other mastery of ad platforms is required)

-Deep experience and expertise of the entire marketing picture, conversion rate, creatives, advertorials, and so on...

We are not looking for someone to just handle our advertisements!

-Perfect English is essential.

-Not associated with any other brand/project; we are only looking for someone who will be completely dedicated to us.

-Being available 7 days a week and prepared to work 200-250 hours per month is required. Please read "Working Hours and Time Availability" for more information.



PLEASE DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DO NOT MEET ALL OF THE REQUIREMENTS AND CHARACTERS.




Job time and time availability:

We demand 7 days per week availability and around 200-250 working hours per month; however, one day per week will be a part-time day (2-4 hours). That will be your "off" day, and all you will need to do is check and turn off a few advertising, essentially simply maintain.

Why do we require his complete availability? Since, especially at the start, there will be a lot to set up, but as time goes on and there is less to do, or when we employ someone to help you (for example, a media buyer), we may gradually reduce the working hours. Nonetheless, we simply want to make it obvious that we are looking for someone who genuinely cares about his or her work.




The Industry:

We are a 100% remote firm with around 15 employees situated in Italy.
Our crew is made up of one-third Italians and two-thirds Filipinos.
Our warehouse is in Italy and is totally handled by a logistic center; we do not drop ship and instead operate on an inventory basis.
The bulk of our purchases are paid on delivery rather than online (currently 95% of transactions are COD), which is our primary emphasis and competitive advantage.

Our ambition is to become the world's largest COD e-commerce company. And to make the purchase of any commodity available to everyone, using any payment option, particularly cash on delivery. All while offering a diverse product line, outstanding customer service, and quick shipment.


(Further information about our organization will be provided in the following phase of the employment process)



The Role:

You will be in charge of the following as a CMO:


-Managing our Facebook advertisements (high level expertise is required)
-Overseeing our Google and Tiktok advertisements (in this case we do not require any previous experience or expertise)
-Overseeing the creation of all of our advertisements across all ad platforms (not the creation, just the ideation as we have 4 full time graphic designers executing, and we will hire a video editor as soon as we need him)
-Managing the whole funnel ideation and execution, including anything related to increasing profitability for our best sellers, testing different landing pages to enhance CR, trying new angles, testing advertorials, etc....basically everything that will provide a greater return on our ad spend.

These are the primary basic items for which you will be responsible; however, we may add a few additional things in the future if necessary.

Note: a more detailed explanation will be provided in the next step of the hiring process, but to put it simply, I, the founder, am looking for someone who can really help grow this business and handle everything marketing-related, so that I can focus on ops, hr, and the rest, which is my strongest suit.




Remuneration:

The remuneration will be made up of a predetermined hourly wage plus a profit share.
Even though this will be discussed in further depth in the following phase, you may expect a salary ranging from 4000 USD per month to 10000 USD per month (with acceptable KPI achievement).
(Please note:The large wage range is purely determined by the profit share, which is planned to be exponential, as are our earnings, with a greater blended roas. Essentially, they agree with us completely)

Job Title: Long term SEO content strategist needed
Description:
We are looking for an SEO content strategist for our website blog. Our goal is not to create generic low quality articles just to get content on a site. Our goal is to research keywords and relevant topics on subjects that are related to and will benefit our audience. Here is a basic guideline:

1. Research relevant topics that would benefit our audience. 
2. Do keyword research and determine if those topics have potential to drive traffic to our site. 
3. Create high quality relevant content that is beneficial to our audience. 

We are open to a few options with this project:
option 1: SEO strategist/researcher and writer is the same person
option 2: SEO strategist researches and chooses topics, separate writer writes the content. 

To be considered for this job, please let us know your experience with SEO content strategy and what steps/methods you use to determine what content to put on a website. If you are a writer then providing examples of blog posts/articles you have written would be great. 

Our goal is to have one blog post per week so we would set a budget for X amount per topic/article and pay that amount on a recurring basis.

Job Title: Safety Item Demonstrator for SwypeSure Website
Description:
Hello,

I hope all is well. My name is Anthony; in August 2020, I founded SwypeSure (www.swypesure.com), an e-commerce & media company at the intersection of safety, personal health, and wellness. We curate a range of easy-to-use products and share safety tips for our customers to promote a safe and healthy lifestyle. We also have a Shopify store through which people can purchase various types of safety items. Since the launch of SwypeSure, we have gained over 76k followers on Instagram and 85k followers on TikTok, creating a community of safety advocates.


We are looking for a skilled and experienced safety item demonstrator who can showcase our products to potential customers on our website.


Responsibilities:

1. Demonstrate and showcase our safety items through video presentations on our website.

2. Create compelling and informative product demonstration videos that highlight the features and benefits of our safety items.
 
3. Keep up to date with the latest safety trends and features of our products to effectively communicate them to customers.


Requirements:

1. Excellent communication and presentation skills. 

2. Strong interest in safety products and the ability to communicate their features and benefits effectively.

3. Experience with video editing software and the ability to create engaging video content.

4. Strong attention to detail and the ability to produce high-quality videos.


If you are passionate about safety and have experience in product demonstrations, we would love to hear from you! Thank you for taking the time to read this.

Regards,

Anthony

Job Title: In need of a Business Developer in Hong Kong!
Description:
Role: B2B Sales Manager (Hong Kong)
Work Schedule: 9 AM to 7 PM (Monday to Friday) and 9 AM to 1 PM (Saturday)
Must be living in Hong Kong

About Us

We are an automotive start-up company that was founded in Hong Kong in 2018 and officially opened its doors in November 2019. During that period, Hong Kong was going through social unrest immediately followed by the pandemic.

Our Vision is to Accelerate the popularization of electric vehicles by being the number 1 Premium distributor in Asia.

Riding along this growth, and the opportunity posed by the growing awareness and demand for electric vehicles, we are now looking to expand its horizon.

To power this growth, we are now in the process of hiring seasoned professionals (to include author) to help the Company realize its vision.

Job Summary

Experienced sales professional to sell our premium electric motorcycles to large companies that are interested in electrifying their current fleet. Responsible for developing new and existing accounts by building strong relationships, and providing exceptional customer service.

Accelerate the popularization of electric vehicles in Hong Kong, by providing premium transportation options from around the world.

The ideal candidate should have past experience in automotive sales and a proven track record in dealing with corporate clients.

With high-level attention to detail and only delivering accurate work on time, you should be able to take a conversation and turn it into a high-quality document and instructions.

Responsibilities

• Clam, professional and logical decision maker even under pressure.
• Well-organized, presentable, proactive, positive, and energetic.
• Experience in building sales processes and procedures.
• Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and communication skills.
• Strong commercial awareness and interest in corporate news.
• Embraces change and enjoys iterations.
• Comfortable using current computer software packages.

Qualifications

• Proven work experience as a B2B Sales Manager.
• Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and communication skills.
• Previous experience selling to the government is an advantage.
• Proven track record with dealing/navigating with B2B and corporate clients.
• Well-experienced in dealing/navigating with government and corporate clients.
• A corporate Sales track record and previous experience with the government are an advantage.
• Well-organized, presentable, proactive, and energetic to develop sales opportunities.
• Result-oriented, self-motivated with a strong desire to succeed, and willing to take up challenges.
• Strong English and Chinese written and verbal skills.

Job Title: Junior High Ticket Sales Rep [Up to $18,000 Per Sale ]
Description:
Our marketing agency specializes in helping businesses and individuals grow virally, both on social media and all over the web. We are seeking a Junior High Ticket Sales Rep to join our team to identify and secure new clients for our services. You will be selling our annual marketing plans worth $30K, $60K, and $120K, and will need to be able to find leads and close them on our high-ticket packages.

www.caviar.social is our website, we own two other agencies as well, Firebird Viral and Search Lotus.

Commission:
15% commission on each sale generated, which with our packages will be $4,500, $9,000, or $18,000 as a bonus on each annual sale. As for potential earnings, we have some reps making $30,000+ a week.

BONUS: this is a probationary period. It is time to prove yourself. After your first sale, we can discuss adding you as a permanent sales rep and giving you your own CRM access with leads, business emails, and other resources. After your first sale, we will send you an updated contract, raising your commission to 20% per sale!

Responsibilities:
- Generate multiple leads of businesses and individuals interested in growing their social media presence by 60K, 120K, or 1.2M followers in a year.
- Identify potential clients who have a substantial marketing budget and can benefit from our services.
- Develop and implement a lead generation strategy to target potential clients through various channels, such as email, social media, phone, and other communication platforms.
- Build and maintain strong relationships with clients to understand their needs and provide them with our services.
- Actively manage the sales funnel and lead pipeline, including tracking and following up on leads, negotiating deals, and closing sales.
- Meet or exceed monthly sales targets and revenue goals.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience in sales and lead generation, preferably in the social media or digital marketing industry.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
- Knowledge of social media platforms and digital marketing strategies.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
- Must meet or exceed monthly sales targets and revenue goals.

Job Title: Project Manager Needed for SEO and Web Design Company
Description:
I own a small agency focusing on SEO and Website Design. I have been in business since 2013 and have needed a good project manager for quite some time. I have a few people to manage and delegate tasks that are mostly freelancers. Website jobs run smoothly but could be faster and SEO projects do well with results, but we lack in communicating with clients regularly and staying on task with deliverables. 

Here is a breakdown of responsibilities I foresee:

**Website Projects** 
-Collect all necessary details from the client to kick off the project such as design ideas, logo, images, content, example sites they like, logins to hosting accounts, etc.

- Communicate with our designer / web developer on the project details and make sure they understand. 

- Check on project and preview the work before the link is sent to the client for review.

- Schedule meeting with the client to review the site and take down notes of changes needed in order to give those edits to the developer.

- Once Design is approved, we will go through a pre-launch checklist and then push it live. 

**SEO Project**
- You must be able to understand SEO in order to communicate factually with the client. (I will provide knowledge on this)

- Setup project in Project Management system. We use Flowlu which is similar to Asana and others. We would already have a template set up to apply to the project. You would be responsible for adding the task template and assigning tasks to the appropriate people.

- Send weekly emails to each client as a follow up on the project (This will cut down on calls and emails from clients.)

- Setup Clients in SEMRush for Keyword Tracking reports to be sent each month. (This will also have a summary section where we can add notes about completed tasks)

- Monthly meetings with some clients to discuss progress, reassure them we are on top of things, remind them SEO takes several months. (I will teach you how to show them KPIs that they can see to ease their mind. SEO client management is really about making them remain patient while we work. Most accounts take 8 months to 12 months for clients to start seeing a return. We tell them this upfront but they forget after 3 months it seems)

**Traits I am looking for in a project manager**
-Must be organized

-Honesty with clients. We can share with them if something negative happens and assure them we will be on top of it. Its always better for us to tell them rather than them find out another way. They will always trust us even if its some bad news here and there.

-You must be a people person. Be friendly, build a relationship thats not all business all the time. We are laid back here and many clients have become friends. 

- Dont oversell anything. We are honest with people and make no promises. Some project managers just go too far and make promises to clients just to avoid confrontation. We like to work through confrontation and make things right on both sides. 

- Confidence is crucial. You need to be confident in what we do so that on any calls with clients, they here were are confident. I have personally had projects that were doing poor for months and I would let them know we will work hard on moving in the right direction and that we just need some time as this is not an exact science. 99% of the time we are right on and the project is a success. Once a clients sees results, they hardly ever email us with any questions or complaints. 

Currently we have about 30 SEO clients I estimate that half need a 30 min meeting each month and the other half are lower budgets that only need email updates. 

I think we have enough work for about 20 hours per week right now, but this will free me up so much to finish another referral channel. I estimate we could hire you for 40 hours per week in the next 3-4 months.

Job Title: Looking for a Social Media Whiz & Content Writer to help promote new programs
Description:
OISE Continuing & Professional Learning is currently running a pilot series of brand new professional learning fellowship programs, and we're looking to create a real buzz about this for our next intake period (Fall 2023). We need to create as long of a lead time as possible for applicants, so we'd like our social campaigns and content to start running in May 2023.

We're looking for an experienced social media manager & content writer to create social media campaigns tailored to our audience needs (audiences vary from fellowship to fellowship) to 1) Raise awareness of this unique offering at OISE Continuing & Professional Learning, University of Toronto, and 2) help to attract applications from suitable candidates for each individual fellowship.

Timing is flexible, but Ideally, we'll be looking to have initial social campaigns prepared before the end of April 2023.

You'll report to and work closely with the Community Engagement & Marketing Manager, and occasionally other members of the OISE CPL team.

This is the first of many potential projects with our team, as we have big plans for expanding our program offerings in 2023 and beyond.

The ideal candidate will be a strategic thinker, and have the ability to distill academic language into meaningful messages that will resonate with specific audiences. You'll have marketing knowledge,  5+years of experience creating effective social media content, and be able to adapt language and strategic communications approaches for specific audiences and business needs. If you've had experience working with other Universities or Colleges, it's a bonus, but not necessary.

About OISE CPL:

The principles of warehouse management refer to a set of guidelines that ensure efficient and effective operations in a warehouse or distribution center. These principles include:

Inventory management: This principle involves tracking inventory levels, monitoring stock levels, and ensuring that inventory is properly labeled and stored.

Space utilization: Effective warehouse management requires the efficient use of space. This involves organizing the layout of the warehouse in a way that maximizes the use of space while ensuring that items are easily accessible.

Equipment and technology: The use of advanced technology and equipment such as warehouse management systems (WMS), barcoding, automated storage, and retrieval systems (ASRS), and conveyor belts are essential in achieving an efficient and effective warehouse.

Staff management: A well-trained and motivated workforce is essential for successful warehouse management. This includes the recruitment of qualified personnel, regular training, and provision of a safe working environment.

Safety and security: Ensuring the safety and security of goods and personnel within the warehouse is of utmost importance. Safety measures such as fire suppression systems, emergency lighting, and exit signs are important, while security measures such as surveillance cameras, access controls, and security personnel help protect against theft and vandalism.

Customer service: The warehouse is an important link in the supply chain, and providing excellent customer service is critical in maintaining customer satisfaction. Timely and accurate order fulfillment, accurate tracking, and on-time delivery are some of the key elements of customer service in a warehouse setting.

By following these principles, a warehouse can optimize its operations, increase efficiency, reduce costs, and ultimately provide better service to its customers.

The Position:
The main focus of this role is to develop, implement and manage personalized marketing strategies for each of our clients including; social media, organic growth, paid ads, brand partnerships and PR. You'll work closely with our clients to understand their goals and objectives, and use your expertise to develop a customized growth/marketing plan that meets their needs. The ideal candidate has a deep understanding of performance marketing, as well as organic growth strategies, and how to structure a customer journey from awareness to purchase (across both product and service-based businesses), You are looking to own responsibility for creative performance across clients that range from early-stage startups to growing brands.


Required Skills:
- Experience working with design teams from brief through creative execution
- Data-oriented thinking to understand how certain metrics impact performance and how to act upon data when things are and are not working

- Expert copywriting skills to deepen brand stories and creatives

- Provide recommendations for social strategies; provide insight on how to plan for social calendars and maintain a constant flow of content

Job Title: Seeking sales professionals with Canadian pathology expertise
Description:
**The company**
We are Labflow, an Australian digital health startup that is transforming healthcare delivery through the digitisation of pathology services.

We use cutting-edge software and AI technologies to enhance pathology workflows, especially processes that are manual and heavily paper-based. By automating existing workflows, we enable digital audit trails that capture the movement and touchpoints of samples as they progress through the pathology ecosystem. 

**The product**
SampleHub provides labs complete end-to-end visibility and traceability of pathology samples, from the point of collection, throughout transportation and arrival into the lab. SampleHub gives laboratories instant access to real time data to track the pre-analytic sample journey. 

SampleHub is an entirely cloud-based solution and is easily accessed via a modern web browser.

**The ask**
We are seeking a sales professional with previous experience in the Canadian pathology sector. To be successful for this project, you will need to leverage your existing professional network of pathology service providers. The ideal customer profiles include pathology operations managers/directors, laboratory managers/directors and specimen reception managers of pathology service providers that operate collection centres. 

Your task is simple: provide qualified leads who are willing to receive a SamlpeHub demo. You find the leads - we do the demo.
