Job Title: ☎️ Looking For Serious eCommerce Creative Strategists To Help With Directing Ad Content
Description:
Hi 👋 I'm Spencer Pawliw! The founder of a growth-focused eCommerce agency over in Vancouver, Canada.

I am currently hiring a contracted (potentially full-time) Creative strategist/Creative director to join our talented team.

💥 With over 16 different clients that range in size from multi 6, 7 & even 8 figures. You can imagine we run a lot of ads... Unfortunately, our team is at hitting max capacity AGAIN and if we are going to continue to bring on great clients, we need a creative director to help us manage the content we generate for clients 💥

So... That's exactly where you come in 🔥

I'm looking for someone to join our team to work closely with our media buyers & current creative director to utilize all of the incredible assets our agency offers such as:

1. Access to our full-time in-house CRO manager who leads a team of 2 developers + 2 copywriters to build you any landing page you desire.

2. Access to our in-house content creators who can film any piece of content you need in a matter of days

3. Access to our in-house video editors and designers who can bring any piece of content to life for you.

4. And access to ALL of our optimized systems, pre-made creative briefs, contracts, and clients who have incredible products & offers for you to scale. 

🫵 Your Role At The Agency? 🫵

- Communicating with clients and working with them to grow their business.
- Doing extensive research and studying market trends to find winning angles
⭐️ Directing our content creators to help them bring your ideas to life 
- Directing our video editors to help them bring that raw content to life
- Crafting angles and writing winning copy for new creatives (with the help of copywriters if needed)
- Devising new strategies for how to sell our clients products
⭐️ Monitoring creative performance via Motion
- Be open to learning and utilizing the free training we have from some of the best marketers in the industry to improve your skillset.

🔎 Who Are We Looking For? 🔍

We have one rule at the Agency... That rule is that you need to have the DESIRE to grow. If you do not want to excel and grow into a better individual, we are not the company for you.

We're looking for someone who:

- Cares more about the client than a paycheque
- Thinks long-term and understands the concept of building.
- Is driven & is passionate about their work
- Is obsessed with LEARNING and wants to absorb knowledge in order to refine their skills and become better at their craft.
- Is confident in their work and proud to showcase it.
- Takes initiative and doesn't shy away from adversity
- Is a problem solver who likes a challenge
- Loves what they do and gets excited by the progress
⭐️ Hard-working and consistently shows up regardless of circumstance & result

And most importantly... Someone who can have a great time with our team. As serious as we sound, we all love what we do and we all treat each other like family. 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦

📝 Final Notes 📝

Coming up with winning creatives in eCommerce is by far one of the hardest skills to master in the digital space. And at Easy A we acknowledge that.

We hold our creative directors to the highest of standards and reward them for the stellar work they provide so you can expect performance bonuses if you can crush it for our clients.

If any of this applies to you or has enticed you at all, I would love to speak with you and learn more about who you are and what it is you’re looking to accomplish.

Thank you to anybody who has gone through and read this end to end. Make sure you include the words "Spencer writes too much" in your proposal for extra bonus points.

Sincerely,

Spencer Pawliw
Easy A Media Inc.

Job Title: Email Marketing Expert Required for our E-Commerce Brand
Description:
We are looking for a skilled email marketing expert to join our team and manage our email marketing campaigns. The ideal candidate will have experience in email campaigns management, email automations, email copy, email platform support, email audience development, e-commerce website promotion, cold emails, lead generation, email design, and sales copy.

Responsibilities:
* Develop and execute email marketing campaigns, including segmentation, list management, and A/B testing to optimize performance and increase engagement.
* Create and manage email automations, including welcome series, abandoned cart reminders, and post-purchase follow-ups.
* Write and edit effective email copy, including subject lines, headlines, and body copy.
* Provide support and troubleshooting for email platform issues, including integration with other marketing tools.
* Grow and engage email audiences through list building, segmentation, and targeted messaging.
* Promote e-commerce websites through email marketing strategies and campaigns.
* Develop and execute cold email campaigns for lead generation and customer acquisition.
* Design and layout emails using templates or custom designs.
* Write and edit sales copy for emails and landing pages to drive conversions.

Requirements:
* Minimum of 3 years of experience in email marketing.
* Strong knowledge of email marketing platforms (such as SendGrid, Mailchimp, Klaviyo, etc.).
* Proficiency in HTML and CSS for email design.
* Demonstrated success in email campaign performance and engagement.
* Excellent writing and editing skills, with attention to detail and brand voice.
* Strong analytical skills, with experience in data analysis and reporting.
* Familiarity with e-commerce website promotion and lead generation strategies.

The position can be either of these two situations:
1.  Become a Team member
or
2.  Set up the system and train us to run it

If you have a passion for email marketing and experience in the above areas, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Please submit your resume, cover letter, and examples of successful email campaigns you have managed in the past.

Contractor: Marketing Associate
Compensation: Hourly, commensurate with experience

CSR is a consultancy that seeks to accelerate the growth of small and medium-sized businesses by delivering strategically-driven results. We transform our clients into higher-performing organizations that are better aligned to their stakeholders’ vision, by getting into the specifics of each client’s current strategic plan and then working ‘from the inside’ to make meaningful and financially rewarding improvements.
The Marketing Associate is responsible for increasing visibility and consistency of CSR. This person will oversee the creation of  all marketing collateral, as well as implement the ambitious marketing plan. As such, grit, flexibility and authenticity are paramount to succeed in this role.

Perqs
Flexible schedule with a firm that values the importance of having a positive work/life balance
Ability to manage your own workload and work remotely
Encouragement and support to be creative, succeed and create more opportunities internally within the organization (and potentially even with our external clients)
Requirements
Strong communication, project management, and time-management skills
2-3 years experience using social media (LinkedIn, Instagram, etc.)
2-3 years experience using Mailchimp or similar software
1+ years experience using Canva or similar software
Experience in a professional setting strongly preferred
Strong people skills, punctuated by living out the CSR values of tenacity, versatility, caring, and openness in both client and internal relationships
A high degree of professionalism and responsiveness

Responsibilities
Implement CSR marketing plan with guidance as needed from CSR Principal
Implement new marketing strategies and methodologies to enhance visibility
Oversee creation of collateral including case studies and blog posts
Manage relationship with website provider and oversee website improvements
Standardize and streamline marketing functions
Internally update and report out on current activities
Attend periodic 1x1 meetings with Principal
It is expected that the Marketing Associate will be timely in monitoring and answering intra-CSR communications (i.e., phone messages, calls, e-mails, Google chat, texts, etc.). Attention to detail, an emphasis on high quality work product, and the ability to reflect CSR’s core values are required in this role. Hours will be variable and pay is commensurate with experience. Sample work product is required, so please have examples and/or a portfolio ready for review.

Project Title: Analysis of the Website to Identify the Reasons for No Sales

Objective: To investigate and identify the reasons behind the lack of sales on the website for the cosmetics and perfumes store operating in Australia, despite the successful Google search and product advertising campaigns that have generated 450 clicks.

Scope of Work:

    Analyze the website to identify potential issues that may be affecting sales, including website design, user experience, product descriptions, pricing, and checkout process.
    Conduct a test purchase to ensure that all website functions are working correctly and efficiently, including payment processing and order confirmation.
    Research and analyze the pricing strategies of competitors in the cosmetics and perfumes industry in Australia.
    Review and evaluate the effectiveness of the existing Google search and product advertising campaigns to identify any potential shortcomings or areas for improvement.
    Provide recommendations on how to improve the website and marketing strategies to increase sales and improve customer satisfaction.

Methodology:

    Website Analysis: Conduct a comprehensive review of the website to assess the design, navigation, user experience, product descriptions, pricing, and checkout process. Use tools such as Google Analytics to track user behavior on the site.
    Test Purchase: Conduct a test purchase to evaluate the entire checkout process, including payment processing and order confirmation.
    Competitor Analysis: Research and analyze the pricing strategies of competitors in the cosmetics and perfumes industry in Australia to determine if pricing may be a factor affecting sales.
    Marketing Campaign Analysis: Evaluate the effectiveness of the existing Google search and product advertising campaigns to identify potential shortcomings or areas for improvement. Use tools such as Google Ads to track campaign performance.
    Recommendations: Based on the analysis, provide recommendations on how to improve the website and marketing strategies to increase sales and improve customer satisfaction. This may include changes to website design, user experience, pricing, and marketing campaigns.

Job Title: Virtual Assistant and Copywriter for an Instructional Design Firm
Description:
Hi there,

We're The Foundation, a digital marketing and instructional design firm, and we're always looking for new talent! Upwork Newbies are ALWAYS welcome. Simply put, we have a small batch of 8-10 minute (up to 20 minutes) interviews, we transform into engaging videos and blogs for one of our favorite clients website. 

OBJECTIVE
We're looking for a virtual assistant with a copywriting background that can watch each interview and find meaningful quotes and summarize each interview into a blog. 
While you'll get to see some super important people, the blog summary isn't about them, it's about the topic, and it always has to do with "innovation." Don't worry, we'll provide samples of exactly what we're talking about. Sound good?

DELIVERABLES
-Pull out 8-10 pull quotes for shorter interviews and 18-20 for longer interviews for the bottom third for our videography team with time stamps
-500 word blog or 1,000 word blog summarizing the key points of each interview delivered in a Google Drive File

RESOURCES
We'll provide you with our client's website and blog so you can learn more about them and their audiences, their Content Matrix (if, you're curious), and past summaries and pull quote documents. We're sticklers about formatting. We'll also provide a sample formatting doc, so you know how the pull quotes, time stamps, and blog should be formatted.

DEADLINE:
First draft is due by Monday, March 27th, 2023. Please do not apply if you do not think you will be able to meet the first draft deadline, or the 24-hour editing deadline.

Draft #1 We'll review your pull quotes for content and readability and review your first draft with our ID team and VA's, using GrammarlyPro. We will provide comments when needed

Draft #2 If you have edits to your first draft, you must fix them within 24 hours, to be considered. We will then pass your second draft to the client for final approval and comments. If all goes well, we'll keep working with you for future projects. 

If this sounds like the job for you, please apply and include samples of your work to be considered. 

Talk to you soon!

Description:
WHY VINTAGE RIDES? 

The Vintage Rides adventure began after our founder Alex Zurcher's first trip to India. He realized that the best way to discover the country was by motorcycle. Back in Delhi after his road trip, he created the Vintage Rides concept: offering motorcycle trips around the world and turning each rider into an adventurer. Since its modest beginnings in India in 2006, Vintage Rides now operates on 4 continents in 18 countries, including India, Rwanda, Peru, South Africa, Sri Lanka, Mongolia, Argentina, and Morocco. Today, Vintage Rides is the leader in the French-speaking market, the official Royal Enfield touring partner and targeting to grow in the German and English speaking markets.
Our Mission: Making Anyone An Adventurer.
Our Strong Values: Sharing, Authenticity, and Self-challenge.


JOB OVERVIEW

Vintage Rides is looking for a Freelance Adventure Consultant who is fluent in German to help us develop and expand our business in the German-speaking markets. The successful candidate will be responsible for building relationships with potential clients, promoting our motorcycle adventure trips, and working with our team to adapt our processes, habits and tours to cater to the needs and preferences of German-speaking riders.
RESPONSIBILITIES 
Joining Vintage Rides as a Adventure Consultant, you can expect the following missions: 

IMPORTANT TASKS
Organise 10 in store events events called “warm ups” to promote our tours in partnership with Royal Enfield dealers. 
Sync with Royal Enfield DACH team
Sync with the dealers and motivate them
Sync & cooperate with VR Communication team based in France to secure all communication is floated onlinbe
Organise the Warm Up : drinks, snacks etc
Lead the event, screen Vintage Rides Movies, Talk about Motorcycle Adventure
Create interest for Vintage Rides tours and save Leads in the CRM
Organise & lead the participation of Vintage Rides to at least one major motorcycle show.
Press Trips : identify potential journalits interested to join Vintage Rides tours, negotiate their participation, coordinate with them and the team to ensure their satisfaction and a positive impactfull coverage.
Nurture the relationship between Vintage Rides & Royal Enfield DACH region.

SECONDARY TASKS


Translate and improve the german website and german content&ad material  in general
Qualify incoming leads from the german market
Lead German go to market strategy.
Sell Vintage Rides tours to German Speaking Riders.
Create B2B business opportunities.
Create branBuild relationships with potential clients and provide them with expert advice and recommendations on the best motorcycle adventure trips.
Create customized itineraries that cater to the needs and preferences of German-speaking clients.
Work closely with the Vintage Rides team to ensure that all client needs are met and that all trips are executed seamlessly.
Attend more trade shows, events, and other industry-related activities to promote Vintage Rides and establish new partnerships.


REQUIREMENTS

Entrepreneurial Spirit, do it yourself/ hands on attitude.
Modesty, Adaptibility - moving an office team based in France can sometimes be a challenge.
Fluent in German and English.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong sales and negotiation skills.
Self-motivated and able to work independently.
Passion for motorcycles and adventure travel.
BENEFITS

This is a freelance position, and compensation will be based on a commission basis in addition to a daily fee.
1.5% of the annual turnover of the German Speaking Market
250 Euros per day once more than 80 German Speaking riders travel each year
200 Euros per day once more than 40 German Speaking riders travel each year
150 Euros per day until more than 39 German Speaking riders travel each year

The successful candidate will have the opportunity to work with a dynamic and growing company and play a key role in expanding our business in the German-speaking markets. If you are freelance and passionate about motorcycle adventure travel and and have a taste for  sales and business development, we would love to hear from you!

To apply, send your resume & cover letter to Alex : alex.zurcher@vintagerides.com 
Learn about us:  www.vintagerides.travel

Job Title: CRO Consultant for Online Course Business (Fluent in Spanish)
Description:
We are a growing online course business that teaches people in Latin America to work remotely for companies in the USA and Spain. 

We are looking for an experienced CRO consultant to help us optimize our ads, landing pages, and funnels to increase our conversion rates and achieve our business goals. 

The consultant MUST be fluent in Spanish as our business is Spanish speaking. Ideally you are located in Latin America.


Responsibilities:

- Develop and implement a CRO program to optimize our ads, landing pages, and funnels
- Help us to define clear goals and KPIs for the CRO program
- Analyze data to identify areas for improvement and develop hypotheses for A/B testing
- Work with our team to design and implement A/B tests and analyze the results
- Continuously collaborate with our team to optimize our ads, landing pages, and funnels based on the results of our A/B tests
- Provide regular reports and updates on the performance of our CRO program


Requirements:

- At least 3 years of experience in CRO for online businesses
- Fluent in Spanish
- Strong data analysis and problem-solving skills
- Experience developing and implementing A/B testing strategies
- Familiarity with tools such as Google Analytics, Optimizely, and VWO
- Familiarity with Meta and Youtube ad strategies
- Familiarity with Digital Marketing strategies for online courses such as the strategies taught by Jeff Walker or Russel Brunson
- Excellent communication and project management skills
- Proven track record of improving conversion rates and achieving business goals through A/B testing

If you have the experience and skills we are looking for, please submit your proposal with your resume and portfolio of past CRO projects. Please include your hourly rate and availability. 

We look forward to hearing from you!

Job Title: Seeking Creative Lead Generation expert to help devise a YouTube and Linkedin strategy
Description:
Hello! Looking for a lead generation maverick to help devise an out-of-the box strategy for finding leads on YouTube. This job could turn into additional implementation work or future strategy creation work if we find a successful strategy. I'm open to whatever strategy you can think of that will yield a sizable list of at least 200 leads per industry with the below criteria.

I'm looking to generate a list of businesses (not influencers or individuals) that have an active weekly live stream or just a weekly show on YouTube. 

Lead characteristics

- Weekly YouTube show that is currently making new episodes
- Show is over 24 minutes long
- Industries are tech and software related: software development, tech, web 3, cybersecurity, SAAS, etc (If this strategy works, we can run it again in another gig for many other industries)
- Target business are in United States (channels should be run by a business, not an individual)
- Lead has a YouTube channel but does NOT currently produce a podcast with their content (so there shouldn't be any playlist entitled "Podcast"
- Business size: small and medium size (about 5-100 employees)

Then, find the contact info for the business. Ideally, use LinkedIn to find the Chief Marketing Officer or other key decision maker's email and/or Linkedin Profile. However, the most important part is the YouTube piece. If you can't do linkedin, I still might be able to work with you.

I have tried devising a strategy myself but with mixed results. 

Please reply with a brief high-level description of how you might solve this. Just a few sentences. No need to give me all the details. Just want to ensure you're experienced in this.

Job Title: Graphic Designer Needed for Proposals, Case Studies, Web Magnets, and Blogs
Description:
From the understanding of a customer's requirements through the award of a contract, the proposal graphic artist manages the development and preparation of graphics for Quadrillion's competitive bids, usually for services worth millions of dollars, as well as for related persuasive communications products, including case studies and related expert materials online and offline.   In the role, the graphic artist works closely with members of the partner team. 

In this role, you'll prepare graphics that communicate the features and benefits of Quadrillion's services and technology, and specifically how those features and benefits address customer needs. 

You will manage requests from across the partner team for graphics that address specific customer needs. You'll be responsible for synthesizing highly complex financial content into clear, informative, persuasive graphics that support a clean, error-free final product.

The position requires the energy, initiative, flexibility, and dependability to produce graphics that reflect Quadrillion Partners' commitment to transforming clients' businesses and growing profits.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
1. Review proposal outlines, concepts, and narrative text and proactively suggest where graphics could be used/improved to more efficiently and effectively communicate with the customer.

2. Work with marketing and partners to gather client information and draft graphics for commercial and government proposals as well as for lead magnets and blogs on the Quadrillion Partners' website.

3.  Conceive, edit, and iterate graphics as necessary for clarity, logic, and readability.  

4. Use Photoshop and Elements to enhance photographs, logos, and videos, as needed, capturing critical messages and also creating compelling and brand-aligned images. 

5.  Coordinate with partner and marketing teams to ensure graphics conform to company format and style.

6. Define and maintain a repository of frequently used graphics.  Company is currently using Visme and is considering an online proposal tool, which would allow partners to author proposals, including adding in case studies and other elements on a high re-use basis.

BASIC QUALIFICATIONS:

Bachelor's degree in graphic design, marketing, communications, art, web design, or advertising.
5+ years of professional design experience in illustration, graphic design, or print production.

PREFERRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:
1.  Proficiency in Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
2. Proficiency in PowerPoint / PDF.
3.  Elevated sense of typographical space and proportions.
4.  Pragmatic approach to design with consistent output, including the ability to identify images and videos that align with the Quadrillion brand for consideration by the partner and marketing teams.
5.  Experience with proposal or grant development.
6.  Knowledge of government or commercial proposals in management consulting and software space.
7.  Experience writing captions or headlines.
8.  Experience following editorial and graphical style guides.
9.  Proven ability to work under the pressure of long- and short-term deadlines.
10.  Demonstrated record of successfully planning and completing both short- and long-term projects.
11.  Demonstrated collaboration skills.
12.  Demonstrated organizational skills.
13.  Demonstrated attention to detail.

Job Title: Full Time Media Buyer(Future CMO)-MEDIABUYING EXPERIENCE REQUIRED
Description:
Requirements/Traits:

KINDLY NOTE: The requirements and traits mentioned below need to be ALL respected or we won’t consider your application

-A Perfect English level is required

-Available 7 days a week, from 5 to 7/8 hours a day(depending on the day). Please read “Working hours and Time availability” to see all the details.

-Open to wake up early in the morning(around 6 AM PH Time Zone) when needed. But in general being very flexible with time availability

-Truly Interested in a long term job position, at least for 5+ years

-Have a good computer

-Have a stable and good internet connection

-1+ Years experience as a media buyer

-Obsessed with numbers, math, and everything regarding data and analytics.

-Extremely precise

-Very ambitious person, as we grow you will have the chance to become our CMO


PLEASE DO NOT APPLY IF you don’t match with ALL the requirements and traits. We will check everything in depth and will automatically skip you even if  you don’t match in 1.




Working hours and Time availability:

We require an availability of 7 days per week, from around 4/5 hours per day, up to 7/8 hours per day on busier days. This will not be forever, but for sure for the first months, while you are still the only media buyer.
On the other hand, while working days are not very flexible, working hours are.

Facebook ads management: Usually lasts around 2-4 hours depending on the day. And must be done between 00 AM and 10 AM(Italian timezone). But there are a few(usually small) tasks regarding facebook ads management that can only be done within 00 AM and 03 AM(Italian time zone). So there might be the need to start working on them during this time on some days, for this reason we specifically wrote ”Open to wake up early in the morning(around 6 AM PH Time Zone) when needed. But in general being very flexible with time availability” in the requirements.

Facebook ads launch, tiktok ads management, google ads management+other related tasks: Usually last around 2-5 hours depending on the day. And can be done from 03 AM to 6PM(Italian time zone), this is the very flexible part.


OFF DAYS:
We do require a 7/7 availability, but every 2-3 weeks we offer the possibility to take 1-2 days off, or almost completely off. This part will be discussed in the first days after the hire.



The Company:


We are a fully remote company based in Italy counting almost 15 employees.
Half of our team lives in Italy, the other half in the Philippines.
Our warehouse is in Italy and completely managed by a logistic center, we do not drop ship, we run an inventory based model.
The majority of our orders are not paid online but on delivery(currently 94% of orders are COD), this is our main focus and edge over competition.

Our goal is to become the largest COD e-commerce in the world. And to make the purchase of any product accessible to everyone, with any payment method, especially with cash on delivery. All this while providing a wide catalog of products, excellent customer service and fast shippings.



The Job(In the short term):

Before starting with the explanation regarding the job, we want to clarify that:
-You must respect all the traits and mentioned requirements.
-The first weeks, maybe even the first month or 2, will be spent in learning everything regarding this job. We will teach you all you need to know, from A to Z. 

The job will consist in managing all our Facebook ads, Tiktok ads, google ads(maybe even new platforms as they pop up) and Everything related to the products that will be advertised, such as when to launch them, where to launch them, and how to price them for an optimal profit margin.

In addition, you will also be in charge of coordinating your “ads creative” needs(for new products, for non performing products, for new launches etc…) with our graphic designers.


The Job(In the long term):

The job in the long term, as the company grows and requires more hours to be spent media buying, once we will max out your working hours, we will hire someone to help you and you will then be in charge of doing your part+managing this team.

As we grow even more, once the team starts to become bigger and bigger, if you keep up with our growth, and manage to grow yourself as well(as a person), you might become our CMO.


Salary:

The Salary, considering an estimate of 200 hours a month(of work), will be around 1200 USD(6USD/H).
Please note that this is the starting salary, obviously as we grow and you take on more and more responsibilities, and manage more team members, the salary will increase.
As a CMO the salary might be even X2-3 times higher

REMOTE PROOFREADER / COPY EDITOR

The purpose of a Copy Editor/Proofreader is to edit and proof the content in a document or digital file. While the two jobs are often combined, each role has distinct responsibilities: A Copy Editor focuses on style consistency, fact-checking, spelling, sentence structure, and clarity, and may also write headlines and subheads. A Proofreader examines the final draft—after it has been edited—for mistakes or inconsistencies in spelling, punctuation, and word usage, and any errors that may have happened between the original design and the final version.

Job Title: Join Our Team of Unicorns: Design Wizard Wanted for Digital Marketing Agency
Description:
Indigo Marketing Agency is looking for a designer who wants to work in a fast-paced, creative environment. 
We are currently looking for an experienced web designer/ graphic designer with 3+ years of experience.

This would be a part-time freelance position, working in partnership with our web development and digital marketing teams to design new websites from the ground up, and design brand identities, marketing materials, landing pages, and advertisements. 

Must have a creative eye for detail and a full understanding of website functionalities, features, and limitations.

QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE

Proficiency in graphic design software: Photoshop, Illustrator, In Design

Extensive knowledge of graphic design and web design principles

In-depth knowledge of design fundamentals and color theory

2+ years experience in website design and graphic design
n
Familiar with common UI/UX patterns and design software

1+ years experience working in a remote/ virtual job

Solid, reliable internet connection and a good computer are a must.

WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING

Design clean, unique, and responsive websites and landing pages for desktop and mobile from the ground up, determining overall styling and direction.

Ensure all raw design files created for collaborative use between design and development teams are formatted neatly and set up correctly for ease of communication and design implementation.

Collaborate with the digital marketing team to ensure page designs are optimized and geared specifically to meet lead generation and marketing objectives.

Specify overarching brand or design guidelines, functionalities, standards, and usage practices for each project.

Strategize website design wireframes and content architecture while applying knowledge of best UX design practices for various, complex industry-specific projects.

Produce high-quality presentations of mock-ups with supporting documentation for all stakeholders involved.
Finalize layouts and strategize input on improvements (if required).

Perform on-going design changes and improvements on existing sites.

Assist our marketing team with internal marketing initiatives.

Creative across all social media platforms
Specify and design branding directives.

If you are interested, please respond via message here or email to Miranda@justdigitalinc.com with the subject line or message “I Am The Best for Indigo” to schedule a time for a call and include the following

- Send us 2-3 sentences of why you want the job,
- Send links to any relevant work or portfolio online
- Links to your social media profile (LinkedIn, Facebook or Twitter)

Failure to use the specific subject line “I Am The Best For Indigo", and follow the 3 steps will cause us to automatically reject you.

We look forward to having you on the team!

Miranda Hernandez
Hiring Manager // Just Digital Inc

Job Title: Personal PR & Marketing Professional for Young CEO and Start-Up
Description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced US-based PR and marketing professional to help increase the influence and fame of Luka Yancopoulos and his startup, Grapevine Technologies. The ideal candidate may choose to leverage the notoriety of Dr. George D. Yancopoulos, President of Public Company Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, to promote Luka as a budding business leader in the medical supply industry.

The PR and marketing professional will be responsible for driving the fame and recognition of Grapevine Technologies, a cloud-based web application that connects medical supply sellers and distributors with buyers. The platform simplifies and automates supply chain processes and aims to provide higher quality care at lower costs. Grapevine recently launched its platform and has raised money in a pre-seed round from VC's, universities, and angel investors in a pre-seed round. The goal is to increase revenue from $10,000 per month to $500,000 per month by utilizing PR and marketing strategies. Grapevine intends to begin fundraising for a seed round in August 2023, and hopes that the work done here will support these goals. 

Key Responsibilities:

Create and execute a PR and marketing strategy that leverages the notoriety of Dr. George D. Yancopoulos and positions Luka Yancopoulos as a budding business leader in the medical supply industry

Build a media relations program that generates coverage in reliable and well-known media outlets

Utilize tools such as social media, influencer marketing, and content marketing to promote Grapevine Technologies and increase brand recognition

Develop and execute a content strategy that positions Luka and Grapevine as thought leaders in the medical supply industry

Collaborate with Luka Yancopoulos to ensure the PR and marketing strategies align with his goals and vision for Grapevine Technologies

Requirements:

- 5+ years of PR and marketing experience, with a strong focus on media relations and content creation

- Proven track record of generating media coverage in reliable and well-known media outlets

- Knowledge of the medical supply industry and B2B sales

- Excellent written and verbal communication skills

- Ability to work independently and as part of a team

- Flexibility to work with Luka Yancopoulos on weekends or between 5:30-9:30 PM EST

- Expectation of 10-20 hours of work weekly, but flexible based on 'strategic plan' and proposal from candidates


- Opportunity to work with a young and dynamic startup that is making a positive difference in the world
- If you are a creative and driven PR and marketing professional with a passion for promoting startups, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and a cover letter that highlights your relevant experience and skills.

Note: 
- Please mention any relevant tools or strategies you have used to drive early stage revenue growth in B2B sales.
- Please mention any relevant 'personal branding' tools or strategies you have used to drive 'young entrepreneur renown'


To learn more about grapevine, checkout this link:
- https://penntoday.upenn.edu/news/streamlining-health-care-supply-chain

Job Title: Hire a Skilled Content Writer to Elevate Your Brand
Description:
Content writing is a fulfilling and dynamic career that allows you to express your creativity and share your ideas with the world. Whether you're writing blog posts, articles, or other forms of digital content, the role of a content writer is both challenging and rewarding.

Challenges of a Content Writer

One of the biggest challenges of being a content writer is meeting deadlines and producing high-quality work on a consistent basis. It can be tough to balance multiple projects and deliver work that meets the expectations of clients or editors. Additionally, writers often have to deal with writer's block, and finding the right words to express their ideas can sometimes be a challenge.

Another challenge is staying up-to-date with the latest trends and developments in the content writing industry. This requires ongoing research and professional development, as well as a strong understanding of SEO best practices and digital marketing strategies.

Rewards of a Content Writer

Despite these challenges, the rewards of being a content writer are many. One of the biggest rewards is the satisfaction of knowing that your writing has helped others. Whether you're providing information, educating your audience, or entertaining them, your writing has the power to make a difference in people's lives.

Another reward is the flexibility and autonomy that comes with working as a content writer. You have the ability to choose your own hours and work from anywhere, making it a great career option for those who value independence and freedom.

Finally, content writing is a highly in-demand field, with many opportunities for growth and advancement. Whether you want to specialize in a specific niche, become a freelance writer, or work for a content marketing agency, the possibilities are endless.

Content writing is the process of creating written material, typically for digital media, with the purpose of informing, educating, or entertaining a target audience. Content writers produce a variety of content, including blog posts, articles, website copy, product descriptions, email newsletters, social media posts, and more.

The goal of content writing is to engage the reader and to communicate a message effectively. To achieve this, content writers must have a strong understanding of their target audience and the purpose of the content they are creating. They must also be skilled at writing in a clear and concise manner, while still maintaining a strong and compelling tone.

In addition to writing skills, content writers must also have knowledge of search engine optimization (SEO) and the ability to incorporate keywords and phrases in their writing to increase the visibility of their content online. They may also need to collaborate with designers and other stakeholders to ensure that the content they produce aligns with the overall goals and vision of the company or organization.

Overall, content writing is a dynamic and challenging field that requires a combination of writing skills, creativity, and an understanding of digital media and marketing.

It can get exhausting to review and message dozens of people. When at the end the freelancers essentially want a paycheck every week without any assurance that the outcome the client is seeking can be met. 

If you are proposing based on this job post, I have to assume your schedule is not fully booked. 

If you have minimum number of hours per week, this job is NOT for you. Please do not reply. 

I know what works to rank local websites and low search volume phrases ...and it is not 40 hours a month. I have he proof of dozens of projects.

Thank you

Lead qualification: Evaluating the potential of leads to determine their fit and interest in the company's products or services.

Lead nurturing: Building relationships with leads through regular communication, and providing them with relevant information to help them make informed decisions.

Sales support: Assisting the sales team with administrative tasks and other duties as needed, and collaborating with them to close deals.

Reporting and tracking: Maintaining accurate records of all interactions with leads, and providing regular reports on progress and performance to management.

In mid-April 2023, Instant Articles will no longer be available. Until then, you still have access to insights and monetisation related to your Instant Articles. Since 14 October 2022, only existing partners have access to Instant Articles.
An Instant Article is an HTML document that loads very quickly in Facebook, giving publishers the ability to tell rich stories in a branded and customisable article format that renders fast on mobile.

Instant Articles provides a faster, Facebook-native way of distributing the content that publishers already produce for their own websites. Every article published as an Instant Article must be published on a news publisher's website as well.

When posting Instant Articles to Facebook, publishers and readers link to articles just as they always have. Each Instant Article is associated with a URL link, so when a link is shared in Feed, readers on Facebook see the Instant Article version if it's available.

Instant Articles work for any type of article, from daily coverage to long-form, in-depth features. Instant Articles are available for readers with iPhones and Android devices running the following software versions or above:

iPhone Facebook for iPhone version 30.0 and iOS 7.0
Android Facebook for Android version 57 and Android Jelly Bean
An Instant Article is an HTML document optimised for fast mobile performance, rich storytelling capabilities, branded design and customised visual display. Instant Articles use a standardised markup language (similar to XML) to apply styles and interactive functionality to a story.

This markup can be applied automatically, to enable automated publication of an entire content feed at scale. Alternatively, it can be applied manually to create bespoke stories that take full advantage of Instant Article capabilities and rich-media elements.

Instant Articles will not be automatically posted. Publishers should share articles on their Pages just as they always have.

Instant Articles are ranked in Feed by the same criteria that we use to rank standard articles on the mobile web. Feed ranks stories based on a number of factors, including the amount that people interact with them and how much time people spend reading them.

To set up Instant Articles, use our quick-start guide.

Job Title: Klaviyo Email Manager for Flow Setup and Campaign Management
Description:
We have a project for a client that has four brands on Shopify and is using Klaviyo. We will provide an overview of the flows needing to be created, aid in any technical setups, and the client can provide some creative assets where needed.

What we need is the following:
-Ability to execute a project plan.
-Someone comfortable setting up standard eCommerce flows using Klaviyo and using their editor to build and design emails.
-Email designs should consider best practices for deliverability.
-Campaign manager, the brand will have promotions and other content they want to send to specific customer segments throughout the month. Being able to adhere to a calendar is required.
-Understand we will also have a deadline of 60 days to get all essential flows running and optimize the following 30 for each of the four brands. This project is meant to last for three months, and if it goes well, we can look into a long-term engagement for ongoing optimization and campaign management.
-Being comfortable with copywriting is necessary. The client will only provide graphics if needed. We will receive brand guidelines and sales/marketing callouts for products.
-It is essential you will work under our agency name. You will be issued an email address to correspond with the client on all concerns. Because of this, no agencies may apply. We are seeking individuals only.
-It is a plus if you have design skills. This will minimize requests from the client. The client can provide email graphics, but their turnaround times will slow down the project.

Necessary skills:
-Detail oriented
-Tests emails and flows across devices
-Copywriting
-Technical understanding of how to use Klaviyo's built-in editor
-eCommerce

When applying, please submit examples of emails you have created. If multiple people were involved, please state your role. Applications must have these details to be considered. Agencies may not apply as we are seeking to work with an individual. This is marked as an intermediate role since critical aspects of strategy will be handled by us. This posting is for someone to execute on our behalf.

Excellent project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects and initiatives in a fast-paced and dynamic environment

Job Title: Microsoft Ads Manager - Dutch Based Medical Company
Description:
We are looking for an experienced Microsoft Ads Manager to join our team and manage our advertising campaigns on the Microsoft Advertising platform. As a Microsoft Ads Manager, you will be responsible for developing and executing effective advertising strategies that drive traffic and conversions for our Dutch based medical company.

Responsibilities:

Develop and implement effective Microsoft Advertising strategies that align with our business goals and objectives.
Manage and optimize campaigns on the Microsoft Advertising platform to ensure maximum return on investment (ROI).
Conduct keyword research and ad copy creation to ensure high quality ads that drive relevant traffic to our website.
Analyze campaign performance data and provide regular reports to the team on key metrics such as click-through rates, conversion rates, and cost per conversion.

Monitor industry trends and developments to identify new opportunities and best practices for our advertising campaigns.
Ensure compliance with all relevant advertising policies and regulations.

Strong understanding of digital marketing best practices, including SEO, SEM, and PPC.

Excellent analytical skills and ability to interpret campaign performance data to make data-driven decisions.
Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
Fluency English is required. Able to Translate and interpret dutch language
If you are a proactive, results-driven individual with a passion for digital marketing, and you meet the requirements above, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity as a Microsoft Ads Manager for our Dutch based medical company.

Job Title: Looking for help setting up Google Ads
Description:
I currently have a new Youtube channel for a business. We are advertising on Youtube with video and overlay ads in order to generate leads for our upcoming crowdfunding campaign, ideally doing it in a way for the biggest bang for the buck.
That being said, I’m slowly discovering some of these challenges.
•	Structuring audience groups properly (to find best targeting combinations)
•	Structuring my ad creatives to figure out the winners properly
•	Having a proper bidding strategy so that I’m not breaking the bank to determine what works well yet enough to have a proper sample size without exhausting the budget almost immediately. 
I currently don’t have the budget to hire someone to run the campaign entirely. That being said, I’m posting the ad here in the hopes of getting some assistance in setting things up properly. I can monitor and tweak things myself, but there could be an opportunity to have regular work sessions/calls in order to better resolve problems.

To be considered though, please answer this question: who are the authors of the book "Big Friendship"?

Job Title: Creative Copywriter and Content Writing - Travel Industry (Remote)
Description:
We are currently looking for a creative copywriter who is dedicated to crafting excellent, original content. Where required (for example with blog posts) the textual content must be well-researched, sourced and cited as well.

Your role in our team would be to:
- Participate in team brainstorming sessions related to content curation and developing a variety of marketing materials across various communication platforms
- Write clear, compelling, error-free copy for various mediums (website content, emails, social media captions, ads, blog posts)
- Write in alignment with our brand values + with an understanding of our target audience personas (you must apply your understanding through your writing)
- Conduct the necessary research to develop and supplement writing, as well as visual elements of the content
- Edit and proofread existing copy, if and when needed, to match and have a consistent voice and tone across all our distrubution channels
- Be well-versed with keyword research tools and SEO principles to maximize copy's reach and effective output
- Interpreting creative directions and technical information and turning them into persuasive copy concepts
- Strategising and implementing innovative ideas to increase conversion rates of produced copy
- Leverage community-generated photos and videos to promote our brands and tours with traveller stories

Our ideal candidate:
- Is collaborative and team-spirited, skilled and imaginative writer with an eye for detail
- Is an individual who's able to grasp project requirements quickly and offer valuable insight and keep up with our fast-paced startup pace with a medium-to-high volume workload often requiring short turnaround deadlines
- Is punctual and self-motivated
- Has exceptional writing and research skills especially in the travel industry (goes without saying)
- Has a degree in English, communications, digital marketing, travel and tourism or related field
- Has experience writing copy for the travel industry
- Is confident in your expertise when you submit your work and is also receptive to feedback
- Effectively communicates with the team about progress of assigned tasks

Bonus if you:
- Have a proven track record of improving organic social engagement and brand identity online by applying social best practices
- Experience with content creation tools and video editing is an asset
- Have experience maintaining a monthly social media content calendar for all platforms (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest)
- Being comfortable in front of camera is a plus

To apply:
1. Submit one short writing sample. We are about to launch an ad selling a tailored trip service for Siwa, Egypt as a destination. Write a short ad caption with which you would entice our target audience to click through (feel free to suggest your own call to action towards the end). We would like to see from which angle you would try to sell the service, be as creative as you'd like.
2. Remember the code word "wordle planet" and mention it in your application.
3. Include ONLY ONE link to your best work in your portfolio so far relevant to the needs of this job post. Your work must be in the travel niche we are posting about.

A copywriter is a professional writer who creates written content for a variety of purposes, including advertisements, marketing materials, websites, and other forms of media. A typical job description for a copywriter might include the following responsibilities:

Write clear, compelling, and persuasive copy for a variety of projects, including advertisements, brochures, websites, email campaigns, and social media posts.
Collaborate with creative teams, including art directors, designers, and other writers, to develop effective and cohesive marketing campaigns.
Conduct research and gather information on the target audience, the competition, and the industry to inform and shape your writing.
Develop creative concepts and ideas for campaigns and projects, and present these ideas to clients or internal teams for review and feedback.
Edit and refine copy to ensure that it is clear, concise, and consistent with the brand's tone of voice and style guide.
Write copy that is optimized for search engines and adheres to best practices for online writing and digital media.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in copywriting and marketing, and continuously seek out new learning and development opportunities.
The ideal candidate for a copywriting role will have a strong portfolio of writing samples, excellent communication and collaboration skills, and a passion for writing and marketing. A bachelor's degree in English, communications, marketing, or a related field is preferred, but relevant experience and a strong writing portfolio can be substituted for formal education..

Position: Renewable Energy Verifier (Land Mediator)

Company: Vanta Leones

Location: International

Vanta Leones is a leading mediation company that is committed to sustainability and accountability. Our goal is to bring together people from all over the world to turn innovative projects into reality. We strive to provide exceptional service to our clients and partners, and build long-lasting relationships based on trust. As the world shifts towards renewable energy, we want to play our part and provide our clients and partners with the opportunity to contribute to a greener future.

To support this goal, we are seeking motivated individuals who have a passion for renewable energy and a strong network of connections within the industry, particularly with land owners around the world, to help us mediate land for photovoltaic systems, wind power plants, and electric car charging stations for our exclusive partners.

As a Renewable Energy Verifier, you will be responsible for mediating land for our partners, such as roof surfaces, open land, and parking lots, on an international scale. You will work closely with us to identify suitable areas to facilitate negotiations and project execution.

Here's what you can expect:
* Attractive commission for each successful land mediation
* The chance to join an innovative and forward-thinking company and make a positive impact on the global energy transition
* Access to training and informational materials from Vanta Leones

Responsibilities:
* Identifying and mediating suitable land for renewable energy projects
* Establishing and maintaining relationships with land owners and partners
* Providing advice and guidance to land owners and partners on suitable land and project realization
* If necessary, supporting negotiations and communication with land owners

The exact compensation details will be discussed during the application process. There is no fix salary for that position - everything is commission based. 

If you align with our vision and values, and enjoy working in an international setting, we welcome you to apply. Please use or type in reference number: 11111

Also check out our tipster brochure attached and our website for more information about our company and what we are doing.

www.vantaleones.com

Join the Vanta Leones Team today!

Job Title: Outsource Call Center Search - projects area of responsibility: Europe
Description:
JOB OFFER - Outsource Call Center Search - projects area of responsibility: Italy

Help us find a call Center 

We are searching for call centers all around the world for a long term collaboration. Requirements are simple - they should be able to call to Italy and should not have like a strong foreign accent. So best case are call centers who offer the languages spoken in the mentioned countries. Second requirement is we offer just a commission based model only. Further informations in the project briefing below. 

A short summary what the collaboration for the Call Centers would be about:

It's about the truck cartel (all big truck companies) & diesel emissions scandal - The Call centers specific task is about helping/informing companies in Europe (including all Balkan countries + Turkey + UK) that they get compensation for a period of 20 years during which they bought/rented/leased trucks and cars. In that period the prices have been manipulated form the truck cartel.

The amount in dispute is now around 1.8 billion Euros, of which the call centers could receive a commission by simple informing our leads about their compensation. The great part is it is no selling, it is just informing the company. The companies themselves have zero costs and zero risks. 

We are working with 3 major companies - law firm in Munich, process pre-financier (private equity investment company from the US) and the consumer protection, on whose behalf we will act.

We already prepared a full back office with tracking, CRM and all leads, PDFs, training videos, scripts and onboarding for the call centers. Furthermore, in order to get all data, details and insights including documents of the legal decisions, an NDA has to be signed of the Call centers CEO or Director during the onboarding process. Contracts etc. will also be prepared for the Call centers CEO or Director and given to them during the process. The representative will be the only person who gets onboarded and he will manage all leads and allocate them to the call centers agents. 

You can give the call centers a quick example of how their work will look like. They will call one of our leads and just inform them of the compensation they are entitled to receive for all trucks and cars purchased/leased/rented between 1998 - 2018. For example, if the company purchased 1,000 trucks and 100 cars, with just this one lead they would receive 10 euros/truck = 10,000 euros plus 10euros/car = 1.000 euros. In average they gonna ‚close‘ 60 trucks per hour. So they can calculate their approximate commissions themselves.

They will get tens of thousands of high quality leads from us (in total we have 17 million leads that can be allocated). We think this would be very very lucrative for anyone, so that’s why we offer a commission based model only (if they are not working on commission only, please let us know right away - in that case we cannot work with them for now). Commissions are paid out within 2-4 weeks and runs automatically through their own back office. 

If a commission based model holds them back from working with us - you can offer them something else. Let's say we work with one of their agents for a week or two as a free trial phase. They can test everything, they get some of our highly qualified leads and see if it works for their company. If the trial weeks went well, they probably already made a few thousand euros. After this trial period, they can decide whether or not we want to continue with a pure commission-based model. So they can't really lose anything and they have minimal risk, except some time it takes for just one of their agents. 

If you are interested and want to know more details, please contact me as soon as possible.

I would be happy to welcome some call centers on board soon.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

We’re a small thriving business in the beautiful Hunter Region, NSW (Australia) that provides horse rides and campsites to our guests. We’re currently looking for a passionate, results-oriented marketing person to help us improve our revenue through data-driven marketing strategies.

The ideal candidate preferably has experience with digital marketing and a strong understanding of the latest marketing trends and technologies. Knowledge about horses and camping would be ideal but not necessary as you can learn more about our business along the way. Job Title: Seeking Ecommerce Expert for Growing Safety Startup!
Description:
Hello,

I hope all is well. My name is Anthony; in August 2020, I founded SwypeSure (www.swypesure.com), an e-commerce & media company at the intersection of safety, personal health, and wellness. We curate a range of easy-to-use products and share safety tips for our customers to promote a safe and healthy lifestyle. We also have a Shopify store through which people can purchase various types of safety items. Since the launch of SwypeSure, we have gained over 77k followers on Instagram and 86k followers on TikTok, creating a community of safety advocates.

As noted, we have a Shopify store, which was recently created. Despite our following on IG and TikTok, our sales have been rather sluggish so far. Shopify's decision to remove us from Shopify payments because we sell "weapons" did not help matters either. After much effort, I was able to find a new payment processor and we are officially back in business! 

With that said, I am looking for someone who understands the Ecommerce space inside and out and can help make SwypeSure an Ecommerce success story. I should note that we dropship products to customers; I do not house any products myself. I am looking for someone who has a proven track record of success in Ecommerce and has generated modest to significant revenue for their store/ brand. When it comes to this job, you will be given as much creative freedom as you need to help us grow. As long as you understand the nuances of Ecommerce and believe in what SwypeSure represents, I am confident that we will work well together!

I am ultimately trying to make the world a safer place and educate people as to the importance and value of safety, particularly for women. SwypeSure has the potential to become the Amazon of safety products; I truly believe this.

Thank you very much for taking the time to read my post. You have no idea how much it means to me! I hope you will be open to helping me in any way you can.

Kindest regards,

Anthony

Job Title: Virtual Assistant, Jamaica Home Sharing Association
Description:
Reports to: President of Jamaica Home Sharing Association

Job Overview:
The Virtual Assistant will be responsible for supporting the President of Jamaica Home Sharing Association in managing various aspects of the Association, including messaging groups, social media, communications, marketing, promotions, and membership management. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in customer service, excellent written and verbal communication skills, and a thorough understanding of social media and digital marketing.

Responsibilities:

Manage the Association's messaging groups, including but not limited to WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, ensuring prompt and professional responses to member inquiries. Respond to any incoming messages within 24 hours, and escalate urgent matters to the President if necessary.
Plan, execute, and manage social media campaigns and posts that promote the Association and its services to potential and current members. Monitor social media platforms for any negative or positive feedback from members, and report any concerns to the President.
Develop and maintain communications materials, including newsletters, press releases, blog posts and other marketing collateral. Ensure all materials are consistent with the Association's branding and tone of voice.
Plan and execute marketing campaigns and promotions to attract new members and engage existing ones. Collaborate with the President and other Association staff to identify opportunities for growth and engagement, and develop strategies to capitalize on these opportunities.
Manage the Association's membership database and processes, including renewals, upgrades, and member communications. Ensure all member information is up-to-date and accurate, and that members receive timely and relevant communications.
Collaborate with the President and other Association staff to develop and implement strategic plans for growth and engagement. Attend and participate in Association meetings, events, and activities as required.
Provide administrative support to the President and other Association staff, as required. This may include scheduling meetings, organizing documents, and performing research.
Perform additional tasks and projects as assigned by the President.

Qualifications:

Proven experience as a virtual assistant or similar role, with a minimum of 2 years' experience.
Strong written and verbal communication skills, with a keen eye for detail and the ability to proofread and edit written materials.
Proficient in the use of messaging platforms, such as WhatsApp, and social media platforms, such as Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram. Experience with graphic design software, such as Canva, is a plus.
Excellent organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
Knowledge of marketing and promotion techniques, including email marketing, content marketing, and influencer marketing.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build relationships with members and other stakeholders.
Positive, professional attitude and strong customer service skills, with the ability to handle difficult or sensitive situations with tact and diplomacy.
Familiarity with AirBnB and the short-term rental industry a plus.

Working Conditions:
This is a remote, virtual position with flexible hours. The Virtual Assistant will be required to attend occasional meetings or events, which may require some travel.

Company Description:

LeadrPro is the first software marketplace directing connecting sellers with buyers of software. Think of G2 or Capterra, but instead of PPC we offer a PPM (pay-per-meeting model). Or a dating app for B2B sales, where we actually schedule the date/meeting and provide feedback immediately afterwards.

We're less than a year old, but growing super fast. Launched our beta at the end of April last year, currently doing over $120k in MRR and recently closed a $1MM+ Seed round in November. We're looking for someone super invested in working with our gritty, scrappy team of hustlers.

Job Description:

Generate new business through emails, socials, text, and calls

Job Title: $1,000/month for full time Digital Marketing Assistant needed for fast growing marketing agency
Description:
------------------------------------------------------
Why this role and YOU are so important to us
------------------------------------------------------

As our Digital Marketing Assistant you will be a strong leader in your area of expertise who is looking to directly impact the digital marketing strategy of some of the top health products, Creators and soon to be celebrities in the world, and have a lot of fun while doing it.

If you love the fast-paced environment of a startup, digital marketing, and working closely with clients, then this is an incredibly unique opportunity to join an accomplished team and help blaze the trail for future growth.



---------------------------------------
Things you'll do each day in the job
---------------------------------------

Own the results of digital onboarding, strategy development, campaign execution and ongoing optimization, reporting and basic maintenance of an entire tech stack.

Develop a trusted advisor relationship with the Creators we work with, continuously think outside the box to generate new campaign ideas, tailored to the unique needs of the clients and incredibly good follow through on daily and weekly tasks, taking excellent notes with deadlines, asking clarifying questions and doing your own research before presenting ideas and questions. 

Software proficiency we expect you to have already and be able to become certified quickly in: Google Analytics 4, Facebook Ads admin panel, Clickfunnels, CRM (changes based on client) Google Optimize, Lucky Orange, Zapier. 

Very specifically, you’ll be:
● Daily updating our funnel dashboards
● Using landing page checklists to make sure all pages have working links, tracking pixels, great mobile experience, etc.
● Logging into ClickFunnels and creating landing pages or making changes to landing pages
● Weekly: capture and organize funnel optimization ideas, implement, track results, update the control based on the results, and repeat the entire process. 
● Send email campaigns to our lists or tweaking Flows and automations
● Send surveys to our customers to get feedback for our products and our marketing message
● Responding to customer service tickets

Weekly: 
● Oversees all customer service and respond to tickets. Can fix most customer facing technical issues (login, access, failed payments, etc.) 
● Build new funnels as directed.
● Monitor funnels for any performance issues, fix them as you find them. 
● Ad hoc items like data gathering and organization, competitor analysis, or bug fixes. 

Monthly: 
● Proactively manage and organize multiple CRM’s: pages, funnels, email automations, broadcasts, tags, etc. 
● Build automation for promo campaigns and segmentation
● Build new landing pages, funnels, etc. with CRM, Stripe, Order Forms, Zapier, Clickfunnels, Membership websites, etc. 



--------------------------
You Will Stand Out With
--------------------------

● Experience in digital marketing, especially if you have previous account or customer management experience from an agency.
● Demonstrated success in fast-paced and demanding environments; you love adversity and overcoming obstacles, puzzles and challenges.
● Excellent communication skills and EQ; you enjoy building relationships, overcoming push back and high touch interaction with leaders in the company. 
● Detail-oriented with the ability to project manage, set priorities and stay organized when managing multiple client relationships
● Strong technical skills, the ability to quickly learn technical concepts and SAAS products 
● Proactive and energetic attitude with the desire to be a key player on a results-oriented team
● Entrepreneurial spirit with with a healthy dose of humility



-----------------------
The Interview Process:
-----------------------

● Reply to this post with a message and put "Yes, I read the entire post!" at the top of your message (you'd be surprised how many people don't read!)
● The Personality Assessment: we have one of the most advanced and expensive personality assessment tools available and we're excited to see your results and share them with you
● After we send your Loom results back, we'd like to receive a short Loom video telling us about your experience as a Virtual Assistant (we'll send a full list of what we want to know)
● After you send us the Loom video, we'll set up a quick call to offer you the job and get started ASAP!



------------------
About the role
------------------

● We're hiring someone for up to $1,000 a month for full time work
● We want to hire this position by February 17th
● Tools we work with: Slack, Zoom, Gmail, Google Docs, Facebook, Canva, KEAP, Thincific
● We work in US time zones and are located all over the country and primarily work EST 9-5pm but there are NO SET HOURS as we rely on you getting your work done when you want and on time
● The founders have been responsible for over $300M of sales of natural health products and created the 35th fastest growing company in the US

Job Title: Looking for On-page and off page SEO specialist
Description:
Fashion brand looking for SEO specialist who can help with on-page SEO, off-page SEO, and help increase website ranking.

Required Experience:
•	Have proven SEO experience, be able to troubleshoot technical SEO issues.
•	Have knowledge of ranking factors and search engine algorithms
•	Audit website to ensure SEO best practice compliance and identify problem areas
•	Able to complete competitive analysis of other companies within the industry and monitor competitive SEO activities
•	Develop on-site and off-site optimization strategies that increase the company's search engine results rankings
•	Research SEO keywords to use throughout the company's website and marketing materials
•	Update content and website links for maximum optimization and search engine rankings
•	Develop keyword targeting strategy.
•	Create, execute & manage organic search strategies 
•	Set measurable goals that demonstrate improvement in marketing efforts and monitor daily performance metrics to understand SEO strategy performance
•	Translate marketing goals into a successful organic strategy.
•	Develop and implement link building strategies, including local listing clean up (removal of incorrect info) and backlink analysis
•	Image file optimization (alt tags and image size)
•	Local listing creation for Google, Yahoo and Bing
•	Be able to execute tests, collect and analyze data and results, identify trends and insights in order to achieve maximum ROI in paid search campaigns
•	Write compelling and high-quality website content, including blog posts and page descriptions

Knowledge, Skills & Competencies:
•	Must be able to speak and write fluently in English
•     Strong technical SEO background required.
•	Web development background is considered an asset. 
•	Experience with HTML & CSS a plus. 
•	Experience with fashion brands preferred.
•	Knowledge of tools including BrightEdge or Stat, Google Keyword Planner, Majestic, Google Search Console, Google Analytics & Screaming Frog, and SEM Rush.
•	Knowledge of Google’s algorithm updates and penalties On-page SEO and technical (site crawlability).

Job Title: Designer need for postcard direct mailing for home service company
Description:
Hi all,

I run an electrical business that focuses on the residential market (homeowners).  We currently run three different post card mailers as part of our overall marketing plan.

We use vistaprint to mail and design these postcard (we design them ourselves).

I'm hoping to find someone to help take our designs to the next level.  I'm definitely open to some outside the box ideas.

I would like to find someone with experience / success making postcard mailers. 

The three mailers we have going right now are as follows -
- Existing customers, mailed once per quarter
- Neighborhood mailers - we mail to the same neighborhoods we are working in, while the truck / vans are there.  This happens once per month. 
- Knob and tube wiring mailers - we own a list of single family homes built pre 1935 and mail 3000 mailers per month to these homes.  These mailers are geared towards knob and tube wiring replacement (first kind of wire used in homes).

I look forward to chatting with you all about this project! We'd want to alter these 3 designs right off the bat. IF things go well there could be some recurring jobs as we update designs and experiment with more mailers down the road.

Job Title: Youtube Ads Expert for Music Composer + Producer
Description:
We are a looking to add an ads expert to our small team based in Miami. This expert will help us create and manage ads campaigns to increase brand awareness and drive traffic to our client's Youtube channel.

The ideal candidate will be an expert in all things paid search, driving user engagement with a proven track-record of campaign, implementing unique and innovative campaigns. A deep and hands on knowledge of executing digital campaigns, including ad tagging, campaign analysis and measurement, and campaign optimization is required. Candidates should have the proven ability to work collaboratively and deliver excellent results.

What you'll be doing:

- Work with the composer and his manager to strategize the creation of campaigns, ad groups, keyword opportunities, ad copy and ad accounts as needed

- Develop paid search strategies and campaigns to drive brand awareness

- Set up and manage paid media campaigns on Google Ads and Youtube

- Closely monitor and continuously optimize campaigns in alignment with campaign performance goals

- Identify expansion and testing opportunities of campaign elements (e.g. creative, bid strategies, audience targeting, etc.)

- Test and optimize paid social ad copy with A/B or multivariant tests, including copy, creative, ad formats etc. across Google Ads and Youtube

- Proactively identify opportunities for optimization, insight, and expansion, provide recommendations and see through to implementation

We are looking for serious talented individuals that know how to make content that sparks attention and engagement. You must have experience when it comes to making content for ecommerce brands selling physical products, and you will be expected to breakdown your entire process on your content marketing strategy to help increase leads and sales.

Posting/management along with content creation is a plus.

(Long time work potential if your expertise is up to par)
(Open to negotiation)

Look forward to hearing from you.
