Job Title: Credit Card Processing Market & Industry Analysis
Description:
Kairos Equities is a small consulting firm that helps small and medium-sized businesses. As a company we are considering expanding into the credit card processing industry, we are seeking a market and industry analysis expert to provide insights and recommendations on the current state of the market and identify opportunities for growth.

Responsibilities:

Conduct thorough market research to gather data on industry trends, competitor analysis, and customer behavior

Analyze data using statistical methods and tools to identify patterns and trends

Provide a comprehensive overview of the credit card processing industry, including industry standards, pricing models, primary providers, and standard offerings

Evaluate the overall market size and growth rate, as well as market segmentation and trends

Assess the competitive landscape by identifying the top competitors in the space and their value offerings or differentiation, as well as smaller competitors that could be potential partners or affiliates

Analyze market drivers and challenges, including disruptions, business owner behavior, and regulatory barriers

Identify market opportunities, including gaps in the market and accessible segments or verticals

Deliver the findings in a clear, concise, and visually appealing PowerPoint report

Requirements:

Proven experience in market and industry analysis, with a focus on the credit card processing industry
Strong analytical skills and proficiency in using data analysis tools and software

Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to present complex information in a clear and concise manner

Strong visual design skills and experience creating visually appealing PowerPoint reports

Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment

Bachelor's degree in business, economics, marketing, or a related field

Experience in the credit card processing industry is a plus

To apply, please submit a cover letter and resume highlighting your relevant experience and qualifications for this role, as well as a sample of your previous work, particularly any PowerPoint reports you have created. Kairos Equities looks forward to reviewing your application and discussing this exciting opportunity with you!

Launched in June 2021, Bilt Rewards boasts one of the highest value rewards programs on the market today, including one-to-one point transfers for travel across over 100 major airlines and hotel partners; fitness classes at the country's top boutique studios; limited-edition and exclusive collections of art and home decor through the Bilt Collection, and the ability to use points for rent credits or towards a future downpayment.

The Media Buyer is often the lead day-to-day subject matter expert (SME) for their clients, providing strategic recommendations, analysis, and reporting as well as responding to ad-hoc requests.

Report to clients and build long-term relationships
Assist in planning out creative advertising materials along with Project Manager, Account Manager and design team
Overseeing day to day performance of campaigns
Proofreading advertising material before launching them
Working in coordination with advertising, media and operations team members


Requirements and skills

Proven experience as Media Buyer or similar role; experience in digital media is preferred

Interest in following advertising and media trends
Working knowledge of media analytics software (e.g. comScore)
Excellent communication and negotiation skills
Organizational and multitasking abilities
Attention to detail
Critical thinking skills
BSc/BA in Marketing, Advertising or related field
Category 3: Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, TikTok, LinkedIn, Other

Job Title: We are currently looking to immediately add (5) reps to our virtual sales & customer support team.
Description:
VCS is a privately held credit management, education, and media firm that provides credit management and business education to people and media outlets all over the world through services, books, seminars and speaking engagements.


The company's CEO is an author, speaker and consultant who is an inspiring, award-winning entrepreneur who has built a company doing what he loves.


This is a positive, energetic and FUN business and we are looking for an individual with the personality to match!


We are currently looking for three inside relationship representative who are highly motivated, detail oriented and want to help us make an impact on the world.


We're looking to fill these positions quickly, so please contact us right away if you think you're the right fit.


We are currently looking to add to our virtual sales/customer support team.


We are looking for positive, energetic customer service oriented team members who will support our sales team.


As an virtual customer relationship representative you are a vital part of the team.


Directly through your efforts, our credit advisors will be able to close our newest leads.


We are looking to fill these position quickly, so please contact us right away if you think you're the right fit.


**Here's what you'll be doing:**


+ Connecting with new and warm leads at the point of opting in to our funnels, websites or social community


+ Making outgoing calls to new (warm) leads from Go High Level and Salesforce.


+ Primarily, you'll be connecting with and determining if a new lead is a prospective client and if so, you'll be helping them to schedule a discovery session with a Credit Advisor


+ Leveraging company created scripts to connect with new leads, warm leads and previous clients


+ Making follow up calls to leads , clients and live events attendees of speaking at events


+ Participating as part of the call campaign team for program launches and live events


+ Returning calls from new leads to help them schedule an appointment with a sales team member (Credit Advisor)


+ Documenting Go High Level and Salesforce our customer relationship management system with the results and tracking each new lead/contact assigned to you


+ Track, manage and report on your assigned leads


+ Building strong relationships with our cherished clients and referrals


**Basic Requirements:**

* Direct client care experience

* Fluent in English - written and verbal

* Strong technical aptitude (Go High Level, Salesforce, Fonality, and able to learn QuickBooks payment processing)

* Proficient in Microsoft Word and Excel, Mac platform, and Google Docs/Sheets

* Able to work extra hours for special projects, launches, and live events


**Here's what you need to have to excel in this position:**

* A positive attitude based in a foundation of abundance

* Passionate about changing lives and making a positive difference in the world

* A shared commitment to the philosophy and the big "why" behind what we do at Vivix.

* A team player willing to go above and beyond

* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills (verbal and written) and a cheerful disposition

* Attention to details

* An energetic, eager, smart and personable/passionate personality

* You use discretion, good judgment and take the initiative to learn what you need to perform your role with excellence

* You are excited and open about learning new skills and exploring new technologies

* You are flexible and ready to do whatever it takes to get your job done with excellence

* You are an excellent project/task manager - you make sure things get done on time by you

* You learn fast, think fast and thrive in a fast-paced environment with the need to meet many deadlines

* Minimum 2 years customer service and telemarketing experience

* Must be comfortable communicating with clients and community via telephone, email or social media.


**Our Ideal team member is:**

* Interested in personal development, finance & credit

* Loves connecting with new people and leveraging the phone to build quality relationships

* Demonstrates the highest degree of reliability and integrity

* Possesses strong writing, researching, organizational skills

* Creative, self-motivated, and detail-oriented

* Ready to learn quickly and independently

* Familiar and proficient with technology

* Strong with inter-personal skills and the ability to communicate effectively

* Committed to enhancing one's skills

* A self-starter who can work at home independently without minimizing results


**Commitment**


This can be a part-time virtual position with the potential to grow into a prime or full time position as need dictates.


We are looking for dependable, reliable team members who will happily go above and beyond to help the company grow.


**Compensation:**


Compensation based on your skills and ability!

Hello! 

I recently created a website titled "Designer Deals Daily" (www.designerdealsdaily.com).  It is an affiliate site that provides daily deals & discounts on designer handbags and accessories - similar to an ecommerce site.  I am struggling with Facebook Ads & Google Ads (recently suspended due to counterfeit goods).  I have created a handful of FB ads that have been rejected.  I am not banned on FB Ads, but I’m sure I have some strikes on my account due to a handful of rejected ads. 

For the record, I do not sell counterfeit goods!  I'm simply a blog/deals site that connects customers with retailers that sell authentic goods. Job Title: Social Media & SEO Execution-- Youtube, LinkedIn, twitter
Description:
Let me start by getting a few things out of the way for simplicity:
1. No content creation. I create all of my own content, this job requires no content creation at all. 
2. I have a YouTube video editor and producer that I'm totally pleased with.
3. I have a website developer/designer that I'm totally pleased with, and no interest at all in redoing my website.
4. My hourly rates are placeholders -- I have no idea what the going rate for this is.

Also, if you send me a proposal that is either 100% copy-paste, or doesn't address my specifics, I'll just delete. Sorry, not being  jerk, just clear on expectations.

I'm an executive coach and leadership consultant. I have a growing (from a content perspective) YouTube channel, a podcast, and decent sized LinkedIn and twitter accounts.

You can see all here: https://linktr.ee/berchelmann (DM me if Upwork screws with the url).

I need someone who knows how to "make it all work" for me. I have content, I have at least a limited audience. What I need (I think) is someone to put it all together for me:
1. Grow my visibility, metrics and subscriber base, primarily in YouTube.
2. Create a plan for cross-posting, YouTube to LinkedIn and twitter to get traction, visibility, and ultimately leads.
3. Help me better understand how to manipulate SEO, mainly on YouTube, and possibly on my website (looking for advice).
4. Help me know and identify content I SHOULD be developing, whether blog posts, YouTube long-form or shorts, etc.
5. Knowledge and support in email marketing a plus.

Bottom line is, I need purpose and intentionality to be able to use my content for better recognition (leading to leads and new biz).

I'll make the hire as soon as I get the right person. If the posting is still live here, I've not made the hire and the posting is still open.

Ask questions if you have them -- I'll do my best to answer legitimate questions quickly. Before you just send the ubiquitous "let's hop on a quick call to discuss,"   I'll likely only do that with 2-3 people tops, so please give me more to go on than just that.

Thanks for reading.

KevinB

The B2B representative will be responsible for selling web design and development services to new accounts to achieve sales targets, developing new sales in these accounts by monitoring customer's existing projects for successful completion of stated goals, and proposing related and new services as they monitor accounts needs for future web services.

The representative is expected to use his/her knowledge of the market and external contacts in companies developing new sites to increase sales. The representative will implement a sales and marketing strategy and tactics to gain new customers and achieve sales and profit goals in the designated geographic territory.

Qualifications & Specifications:

Strong preference for at least three years of hands-on experience in B2B sales and marketing in fields relevant to the company’s offerings.

At least three years experience in a B2B sales, marketing, or similar role in a technology services company, preferably in website design and development or app development.

Strong preference for a candidate with a successful track record of developing new business accounts and revenues in web services.

Strong knowledge of web services sales principles, methods, practices, and techniques.
Basic understanding of the web development process, especially as it relates to website design and development.

Ability to operate in a small company environment that requires hands-on implementation, optimal use of limited resources, and an ability to work closely with others in a team setting.
Successful track record of interaction with customers in site development roles in small and medium organizations.

Able to close business and drive accelerated growth.

Self-starter – individual needs to be proactive and persistent in achieving the company’s customer development, relations management, and business objectives.

Ability to maintain client and sales management and tracking systems in an orderly manner.

Excellent team player with strong communication skills within and outside the organization.

What we expect;

We expect sales representatives to be fully autonomous and self-managed. We do not have time to micro manage you or your schedule.

We expect you to put all prospecting data into the company Monday App CRM on a daily basis.

We expect you to represent the company in a professional and courteous manner at all times.

We expect you to communicate with our in-house staff on a regular basis. We expect you to follow up with the leads provided to you by our internal marketing efforts.

We expect you to protect our brand and reputation at all times in the effort you carry out.

What we as a company provide;

A corporate email address.
A corporate CRM account (Monday App)
Snov.io Access (For prospect information not readily discoverable on the internet.)
Access to Accessibility Audit Report Generator
Access to SEO Audit Report Generator
Access to Website Audit Report Generator Reputation Audit Report Generator
Typical workflow;

Sales representatives will work to build leads by prospecting in any number of ways.

Local businesses
LinkedIn connections
Small Business groups and forums
Auditing websites in specific verticals*

Next the sales representative will enter all data found in the discovery period into the Monday App CRM. (Organization Name, Address, Phone, URL of the website, contact name, email, etc.) Any missing data can be searched and found on SNOV.IO.

Once you have compiled this data, you will engage the prospect. Pitching our services and showing the features and benefits of working with us. Also, via audit reports, you can show the prospect what they are currently doing wrong. What is currently not working on their site, and how we can fix it.

Now at the point, the customer agrees to a proposal is when you engage with Ask the Egghead staff. You will move the client card in the CRM (Monday App) from lead to qualified lead and enter all of the notes you feel are important into the client's card so that we can generate a full proposal that meets the needs they discussed with you. (At this point, you can also communicate, call, chat, Zoom, Skype, etc., with Ask the Egghead office staff to enable us to build a proposal that meets everything you discussed with the client.)

After this point, administrative staff will take over the sales process.

Job Title: Social media content for health tech start-up
Description:
Hi! We're looking for a social media manager to create pre-launch content for Instagram, Tik-Tok, and LinkedIn that supports our brand and mission. 

About us: We’re on a mission to expand the healthspans of our members by being their trusted health advisor. We work with leading researchers at top universities that collectively represent the main drivers of health, including internal medicine, physiology, psychology, and nutrition. That inter-disciplinary team has designed a highly personalized, comprehensive model to assess our member’s health using lab, connected device, and survey data. Those assessments form the basis for highly personalized advice, tailored to a member’s available time, current health-related investments, and resources. Progress is tracked through up-to quarterly lab diagnostics, as well as periodic surveys and connected device data. 

About the team: our academic partners are from Johns Hopkins, University of Chicago, Harvard, University of Maryland, University Southern California, University of Texas at Austin, Naval Graduate School, and Dartmouth University; we are being advised by three large employers, including Capital One, and retired CHRO’s at Hyatt and Life Technologies; and the operational team is a group of successful technology entrepreneurs who want a trusted health advisor in their life. 

About the project: we're looking for someone that can post 2-3 high quality posts per-week between February 27 - July 15, and perhaps after that point as well. This is the period before our launch this summer, and we'd like to start  building an inventory of content. We're open to suggestions, but we're thinking the posts could include very short insights from new academic research - culled from newspaper articles, blogs, and specific journals. Funny or witty insights into health are welcome too!

About the brand: check out BellSant.com to get a feel for what we posted last year; another version is coming out next month.  Bottom line: we're a bunch of academics, who love French style and their playfulness, and are highly experienced building innovative companies.

Job Title: Funnel Hacker / Digital Marketer / Growth Hacker
Description:
About the Role
We’re currently working on 15 offers to optimize and scale and looking for stellar digital marketers to support our CMO & marketing team in pushing them forward.  Are you the Digital Marketing Manager/ Funnel Hacker that we need to join our remote workforce?  
 
We’re looking for driven self-starters who thrive in a culture of independence (aka no micro-management), problem solving (you don’t focus on problems, you bring solutions) and rapid progress (you enjoy juggling several initiatives at once).
 
This opportunity is a unique chance to work closely with an incredible team and to see your efforts make a real impact every day. We’ve got the offers, audience and incredible testimonials - you bring your passion, fresh ideas and desire to push them out into the world. 
 
We view our projects in three categories: Metrics, Optimization and Scaling - Any projects you work on will be supported by our data analyst to provide metrics and our Facebook ad agency. Your role will focus on optimizing funnel pages, conversion & email engagement.
 
The Funnel Hacker/ Digital Marketer is responsible for:
•Building Opt In, Sales, OTO and Checkout pages within Clickfunnels
•Optimizing funnels by split testing regularly
•Coming up with & sharing new ideas to test
•Tracking the results of the funnels you work on
•Presenting weekly results of your funnels in a team meeting
 
As part of our Marketing Team, this role will work to:
•Run Data Driven Marketing - Constantly measuring all KPI’s to have a strong understanding of what is working and what is not.
•Constantly Optimize and Improve our marketing - including opt-in pages, sales pages, email funnels, user experience and more
•Generate fresh ideas & offers to find new opportunities in testing
 
You’ll know you’re a fit if you are:
•Experienced in Clickfunnels, the platform we run each of our offers through
•Knowledgeable of the full funnel flow and have experience with building opt-in pages and sales pages, writing email and web copy, split testing, and more
•A natural hustler - you thrive in a fast-paced environment & enjoy continually learning & growing 
•Analytical - you know how to create a hypothesis and design a test to prove a theory; you are skilled at mining data for insights and generating hypotheses for constant and fast iterative testing.
•Both detail-oriented and big picture: you have vision and the tenacity to take your projects from ideation to the finish line
•Curious and innovative - you are constantly keeping up with the latest trends and looking for ways to improve the user experience.
•Tech savvy and solution-oriented
•Independent & a self-starter: you’re comfortable progressing your projects with minimal hand-holding
•Collaborative & versatile: you enjoy working together across teams to turn ideas into action
•Are organized and methodical in setting up processes
•A clear and considerate communicator, both verbal and written, with a strong sense of professionalism
You’ll earn some extra credit if you also have:
•Infusionsoft experience
•A passion for the digital media space in health, wellness, and personal development

Job Title: Job Title: Telemarketer (Solar Energy Appointment Setting)
Description:
Job Title: Telemarketer (Solar Energy Sales)

Location: Remote (Work from Home)

Job Type: Part-time / Full-time

About the Company:
Our company is a leading provider of solar energy solutions, specializing in the design, installation, and maintenance of residential solar systems. We are passionate about promoting sustainable energy practices and reducing our carbon footprint.

Job Description:
We are looking for a driven and motivated telemarketer to join our growing sales team. The ideal candidate will have experience in telemarketing and a passion for promoting environmentally friendly solutions. In this role, you will be responsible for calling on leads provided by the company to promote our solar energy products and services.

Responsibilities:

Contact potential customers through provided leads to promote our solar energy products and services
Provide potential customers with information about the benefits and features of our solar systems
Schedule appointments with potential customers for a sales representative to conduct a follow-up visit
Keep track of call results and customer interactions in our database
Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets
Requirements:

Proven experience in telemarketing, customer service, or sales
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Strong organizational and time management skills
Ability to work flexible hours
Passion for promoting environmentally friendly solutions
Compensation:
This is an hourly based position with a competitive commission structure. We offer flexible hours and the opportunity to work from home.

To Apply:
Please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your experience and why you would be a good fit for this role.

Job Title: Freelance Web Performance Optimizer with a Path to Full-Time Employment
Description:
Location: Remote

About the Company:
We are an SEO agency specializing in creating high-quality websites using WordPress and Duda as our primary web design platforms. Our goal is to provide our clients with fast-loading, visually appealing, and user-friendly websites.

Job Description:
We are seeking a Freelance Web Performance Optimizer to help us improve the load speed of our websites and resolve Google Search Console errors. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of website optimization techniques and a proven track record of improving website speed and performance.

Responsibilities:
* Analyze and identify the root causes of slow website load speed and provide recommendations to improve performance.
*  Implement best practices for website optimization, including image optimization, minification of CSS, JavaScript, and HTML, and other techniques
* Monitor and resolve Google Search Console errors
* Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and techniques in website performance optimization

Requirements:
* Proven experience in website optimization, particularly with WordPress and Duda websites.
* Knowledge of website performance metrics, such as page speed and time to first byte (TTFB)
* Familiarity with Google Search Console and its features
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
* Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

This is a freelance position with the potential to become a full-time position in the future for the right candidate.

If you are passionate about website optimization and want to help us provide our clients with fast-loading and visually appealing websites, we would love to hear from you! 

Please submit your resume and a brief cover letter explaining your experience and why you would be a good fit for this position.

Job Title: Experienced Virtual Assistant With Prior Experience In Digital Marketing Agencies
Description:
We are Winning Edge Partners, a UK-based marketing agency specialized in the Med Spa space. Whilst generic agencies focus only on lead generation and/or appointment setting, Winning Edge Partners picks up where other agencies left off and helps clients (i) close the leads, and (ii) optimize their businesses.

About the Job

We are looking for an experienced virtual assistant to handle day-to-day administrative tasks as well as whatever needs to get done - this is a dynamic role. You are the ideal applicant if you are (i) a get-shit-done individual, (ii) amazing at what you do, (iii) loyal and hard-working, (iv) so productive your last manager considered hiring two people after you left, and (v) happy to be working very closely with a business owner.

We are currently pre-revenue with no clients, so in first instance you would be helping me getting the agency off the ground. As we scale, so will your pay.

For completeness, you will be taking on the following tasks:
*Scraping leads in the UK Med Spa space from online software tools
*Setting up, launching, reviewing, and managing FB/IG ad campaigns
*Setting up retargeting pixels, custom conversions etc.
*Build & A/B test high-converting landing pages and forms
*Other non-marketing related tasks

Requirements:  

You must satisfy ALL requirements to be considered for this job:

*Proven experience working with a social media marketing agency
*Proven experience setting up, launching, and managing effective FB/IG ad campaigns
*Proven track record at creating high-converting landing pages, funnels, etc. 
*Proven track record at writing ad copy and using effective creatives
*Ability to check on client campaigns and report results into a spreadsheet daily
*Complete fluency in English and excellent communication skills
*Ideally, you will also have experience working with Asana, Slack and Go High Level

It is fundamental you are able to prove all of the above with data.

How to Apply:

1. Send over a brief 1-2 minute Loom video presenting yourself and explaining about why you believe this job is for you
2. Watch and summarize in a PDF file the following video from YouTube - “DAY 3 - Creating Your Offer (10 Day Agency Course)” – Joel Kaplan. This is a crucial step and will help me understand how good you are at taking information, synthesizing it and communicating it.

Thank you and good luck

A bit about us... Helm exists to free people and their potential.

In our work together, you'll doubtless discover both limitations and all that you need to catapult yourself beyond those limitations.

As a teenager, I discovered a near-paralyzing fear I had of public speaking when I was asked to give a talk. Years later, a communication coach shifted my paradigm. Soon after, I escaped my incapacitating dread and grew to love speaking.

What are your limitations? Some you may know. Some may be invisible. It's said that the worst prison is the one you don't know you're in. Elephants are born in parts of the world tethered to a stake in the ground and don't travel outside a 10-foot radius. By 1 year old, the elephant can snap the stake like a toothpick but it doesn't because it's been conditioned.

A big part of Helm is discovering our "growing edge" - the next realm of growth. And a big part of what animates our team at Helm is elevating each other beyond our conditioning and revealing the potential each of us has. But that is the only part.

Inspired by my own transformation, I spent over 20 years coaching individuals and organizations to break free from their limitations. While liberating, I learned that focusing just on success in my life or just "within the four walls of my business" isn't enough. And for one simple reason: freedom outside "our four walls" is vanishing and robbing us of our personal freedoms.

Threats to our freedom take many forms but they share 1 key feature: aggression. The core of my philosophy is the non-aggression principle: live and let live. Each of us should be in charge of our body, our property, and our money. If you have in you the fight to preserve freedom and individual liberty, it's my privilege to support and empower you however I can on your journey.

Job Title: Expert Cold Email First Line Copywriter Required
Description:
Are you a wordsmith with a keen eye for detail? 

Ever scroll through an email and cringe at the multitude of spelling and grammar errors? 

Not everyone finds this tedious – in fact, we’re in the market for someone with your specific skill set! 

The role: 

You’ll work on writing deep, genuine and clever compliments to people that will be used for the first line of our cold emails. 

You: 

As you’ll be working across all of our industry sectors, a flexible approach to work is essential – along with a strong creative flair! 

You’ll also need provable writing experience, excellent English communication skills (written and verbal) and the ability to work to deadlines. 

You’ll action any necessary edits swiftly and efficiently, and take care to ensure that all of the cold email first lines you write are excellently crafted. 

These lines need to be incredibly specific and so personalized that there is no way you could send them to anyone else, apart from the person you wrote it for. 

About Royal Leads

Royal Leads is a Lead Generation agency based in the heart of the East Midlands but serving clients on a global scale. 

With a team dotted across the UK, USA, Philippines, and more, they operate around the clock and communicate predominantly through WhatsApp and function more like a Silicon Valley startup, and have a work ethic comparable with a manufacturing facility that operates on a 3 shift system. 

It’s no surprise when you consider their founder Phaibion Royal is an ex-Airbus aircraft electrician and occasionally shares the ring with professional boxers.


Benefits of Working With Royal Leads

- Work from home
- Flexible working hours
- Company trips, nights out
- Learn very very fast
- Work with podcast speakers
- Work with part-time boxers
- Work with fully digital remote teams across multiple time zones
- Build and grow entirely in the cloud
- International work-cations where we meet and work in a foreign country for one week
- Worst case - learn tons, get an amazing reference and move on
- Best case - go full-time, build your personal brand and work from anywhere in the world
- Take the digital skills you learn with us and apply them to any job in any industry

If this sounds like something you'd ideally like to take on then we'd love to hear from you.

Please apply for the role through Upwork and a member of our team will reach out to you with the next steps!

Job Title: seo strategy for UK Jewellery Gifting business
Description:
RESEARCH

When the keywords ROI starts to stretch, we’ll look at ways to get in
front of new audiences, such as paid social and YouTube, as well as
make more from your existing customer, like through email.

2 AUDIENCES

It’s nearly always your search customers who are closest to purchase.
This is about identifying and being found for your most profitable
keywords.

3 KEYWORDS

4

We conduct regular analysis on your opportunities and performance,
and serve the information to you in a monthly report. How can we be
doing better each day?

TECHNICAL ISSUES IDENTIFIED

- The website has over 200 URLs which are isolated, meaning they can only be accessed by a canonical.
- 460 pages only have one inbound link - which can indicate poor internal linking structure.
- Duplication appears around page titles and meta descriptions for 15+ pages.
- Missing ALT text for over 5,000 images - this can help enhance appearing for image searches.
- Meta descriptions and page titles are too long/short or missing on over 700 pages and will need optimising.

REQUIRING FURTHER INVESTIGATION

- Nearly 500 canonicals point to a different URL.
- Key attributes such as H1 being missing, too long or not viable.
- Google Search Console errors.

Page titles are written from a merchandising
perspective as opposed to SEO-focused.

- Meta descriptions are not used on all pages,
which is a missed opportunity as it allows you
to bring out key information, at the moment it
is showing as “subscribe to get special offers”
on some pages.

- The website has low content volume in key
areas such as category pages, which can help
SEO.

- There is low utilisation of quick-links within
the content body - which improves crawling
and visibility.

CREATING A MORE DIVERSE WRAP AROUND CONTENT STRATEGY, THIS COULD INCLUDE:

- Publishing specific posts and pages to answer questions that have search volume.
- Publishing buying guides which have the opportunity to rank for keywords around
the core topics.
- Creating supporting content to help increase the internal links of key products and
ranges.

COMPETITION LANDSCAPE

- Gifting guides which provide more insight than competitors.
- Insight articles such as vermeil explanation or other industry terminology.

BACKLINKS

ESTABLISHING A BACKLINK PROFILE THAT IS STABLE

- As a new website, there is an elevated risk of getting a penalty if we build out
backlinks too aggressively or incorrectly.
- Creating a slow and steady build up of a backlink profile will help accelerate the
organic visibility of the website.

COMPETITION LANDSCAPE

- By establishing straight forward and industry relevant backlinks after reviewing the
competition, it can provide us with some tactical quick wins.
- Creating content with strong value propositions will naturally attract wider backlinks
- which can also be helped along by some basic outreach.

Job Title: Product Researcher and Market Analyst with Lucrative Rewarding Program
Description:
We are a growing e-commerce company operating in the dog/pet and toddler/baby niches and are looking for talented and motivated product researchers to join our team on a long-term basis. We are searching for 4-6 product researchers who are capable of searching new and innovative products on a weekly basis.

As a product researcher, you will be responsible for finding at least 4 new products for our Shopify stores each week, 2 for each niche. We are looking for individuals who have a keen eye for detail, are able to research high-quality products, and may have already experience in the dog/pet and/or toddler/baby niches.

It is important to note that our process and strategy for finding winning products is based solely on Facebook's Library. We believe that Facebook's Library offers a wealth of opportunity for finding new and innovative products, and we have developed a proven strategy for identifying the products that are most likely to be successful on our Shopify stores.

In order to help you get started, we will provide you with access to all the training documents, videos, and instructions through a Google Drive link. We will also create a documentation sheet for you, which you will also have access to through the Google Drive link, where you can document the products you have found. We ask that you take the time to thoroughly read all the training instructions and familiarize yourself with our workflow and the requirements listed in the instruction sections.

We have a rewarding program in place for our product researchers. Every researcher is listed in our system and the products they provide are tracked. The researchers who hit the most profitable products receive more time and money from us, and they are also eligible for bonus payments based on the performance of the winning products they find.

We are looking for individuals who are motivated, hard-working, and who are dedicated to providing us with the best products possible. If you are looking for a long-term opportunity to grow your skills and make a real impact, we encourage you to apply today.

If you have any questions or concerns, don't hesitate to reach out to us. We're here to support you and help you succeed. Good luck and we look forward to receiving your application!

Job Title: Marketing Agency Interested In Lead Generation Campaigns
Description:
My objective with this post is to identify and connect with a growth-focused agency that is interested in taking on more clients. 

The day I shifted from selling marketing to delivering results, my career changed forever.  I could charge 3-5x more up front, and everything else my clients asked for turned into more revenue. 

As I write this, my business partner of three years recently let me know she was shifting her focus to spend more time with family, which I can't blame her for. 

Now, I am looking to identify a team with similar ambitions backed by a willingness to do great work and create customers for life. 

I have a well-oiled enrollment process that ensures clients pay what we ask and they pay on time. 

I love being on the front end managing client expectations and ensuring things happen on time and on budget. 

I also write copy and my track record of results dates back to 2002 when I managed several eBay stores and went on to create e-commerce stores with global reach and distribution. 

I can provide references that point to $50M in direct results produced from my campaigns. 

I would love to hear about your team, what's brought you here, and what your vision is for the future. 

In terms of a working relationship, I envision the following. 
1. Comparing and synchronizing our mutual processes. 
2. Identify a niche, create a test campaign, and run some traffic/ads. (I'm happy to contribute $)
3. Evolve our process with our first few clients and see where things go. 

Most of the results I've produced over the last few years have been in the B2B and medical appointment setting niches. 

I build something I like to call "two-step application funnels" and I have documented workflows and SOPs for team training etc. 

I've successfully charged as much as $30K for these builds and for simple funnels I can usually keep hard costs under $5,000. 

I typically lead strategy and write the core campaign copy.  I rely on designers, page builders, and video editors for assembly under my direction. 

No platform I have found (in doing this for almost 20 years) compares to what High Level can provide as an all-in-one funnel/CRM solution, but I'm also open to whatever your workflows and experiences have yielded.  

The video below is to give you a little more insight into my blueprint and vision. 

Let's talk soon. 

https://www.loom.com/share/1b5501fc81c74c1db0775241fe227029

Job Title: Go To Market (GTM) Manager and Social Media Lead
Description:
More detail: A go-to-market (GTM) manager is a dedicated?leader?responsible for?managing the go-to-market strategy and process of our product launch and listing service globally. The GTM manager will work with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth launch operations. The GTM Manager will help develop creative briefs, guide creative direction, and execute and manage marketing campaigns to meet objectives for all advertising and public-facing communications, including print, digital, and video assets. The GTM manager will be able to strategize, conceptualize and execute on multichannel campaigns across the prospect and customer lifecycle, ensuring the alignment of communications and messaging in all channels. The GTM manager will manage content and updates for customer and internal touch points, work with the executive team to establish budget guidelines, participate in events, document business processes, and provide sales support. The GTM Manager will work with the team to gather customer and market insights to inform outreach strategies, increase customer conversions, and generate more qualified leads. The GTM Manager will identify the effectiveness and impact of current marketing initiatives with tracking and analysis and optimize accordingly. GTM Manager will be comfortable presenting ideas and final deliverables to internal and external teams, and communicate with senior leaders about marketing programs, strategies, and budgets.



The GTM manager will work with the Executive Team to frame the strategic vision, ensure the hiring of the right?team, and motivate the team to work on operational initiatives and achieve launch goals.


Job Requirements:
Ability to work in a well-diversified team
Creativity and Interpersonal skills
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English, additional language is preferred but not required
Proven success in developing marketing plans and campaigns

Strong project management, multitasking, and decision-making skills

Metrics-driven marketing mind with eye for creativity

Experience with marketing automation and CRM tools

Knowledge in fintech/blockchain/NFT/cryptocurrency/DeFi/GameFi/rarities is a plus.
Experience/Passionate in eCommerce/blockchain/future technologies is a plus.
Unorthodox, multi-skilled, creative minds and out of the box thinker.
Utilize data to provide actionable insights and ensure the company is driving towards the best possible outcome.

A leader that takes initiative and full responsibility for desired outcomes


Duties and Responsibilities:

Generating customer insights:?Generate in-depth insights by understanding customer needs using customer validation, buyer persona creation, customer building, and customer discovery techniques.

Market benchmarking:?Deploy learning strategies to gain more information about the market, such as market segmentation, market development, market refinement, and competitive intelligence analysis.

Project planning:?Outline the complete go-to-market strategy and project plan. Hire the right team members to work on specific launch responsibilities.

Social Community Support: Tie together our marketing activities and GTM strategy, landing in Discord and supporting the future of our metaverse engagement.

Ensuring cross-functional collaboration:?Steer cross-functional teams across sales, product, content, marketing, legal, operations, and finance. Evaluate ideas, motivate teams to meet deadlines, and ensure all-around alignment in the go-to-market process.

Tracking launch progress:?Define and set up measurement milestones, metrics, and key performance indicators (KPIs) for launch initiatives and activities.

Launch Campaigns: Work with the cross-functional team to execute go-to-market strategy and launch marketing campaigns.

Achieving Target Results within Timelines and Budgets: This leader will commit to and deliver on specific targets and milestones within the expected timelines and budgets.


QUALIFICATIONS:

3-5+ years of experience in the same role

Social Media Marketing Expertise

Go-To-Market Product Manager Experience

Proven working experience in social media marketing and Go-To-Market execution

Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Demonstrable social networking experience and social analytics tools knowledge.

Competency with Sales and Marketing tools and automation

Knowledge of online marketing and good understanding of major marketing channels

Positive attitude, detail and customer oriented with good multitasking and organizational ability

Proficiency in Photoshop, Wix, WordPress.

Job Title: Looking for a French SEO Freelancer
Description:
Bonjour !

Nous sommes une "agence" digitale spécialisé dans l'accompagnement de marques ecommerce & B2B dans l'acquisition de clients/ventes à travers le SEO,

On opère pas comme des agences traditionnelles, on se focalise sur un seul service (SEO) et avons une structure type "groupement/collaboration" de freelances avec des compétences spécifiques afin de servir au mieux nos clients & leur garantir les meilleurs résultats,

On recherche l'aide d'un expert SEO pour intégrer notre équipe et gérer 2 à 10 comptes clients,

Responsabilités Type:

- Créer et exécuter des campagnes SEO
- Suivi de l'évolution de la campagne
- Comprendre & savoir naviguer le landscape de Google avec une approche long terme
- Offrir des résultats hors paires aux clients

Ce dont nous ne nous soucions PAS :
- Titres et diplômes!

Nos Valeurs Partagés:
* Vous pouvez travailler quand vous le souhaitez. Vous n'aurez pas à vous réveiller ou à travailler à un moment donné.
* Vous pouvez travailler autant que vous le souhaitez. Vous serez payer en fonction du nombre d'heures travailler & votre part de travail dans les campagnes des clients, mais si vous faites des heures supplémentaires, vous serez payé.
* Vacances / temps de travail flexibles, si vous avez besoin de temps libre, faites-le savoir, nous favorisons pour tous un cadre qui est bénéfique à tout le monde
* Capacité à travailler à DISTANCE (Ou que vous souhaitez dans le monde - FULL REMOTE)

Pour postuler à cette offre :

Veuillez écrire "OREOS" tout en haut de votre candidature.

Répondre aux questions suivantes:
1) Depuis combien de temps faites vous du SEO?

2) Quelle a été votre pire expérience lors d'une campagne SEO?


OBLIGATOIRE

Merci d'inclure dans votre application des campagnes de cas clients pour lequel vous avez généré des résultats, 

Sans des exemples de cas clients concrets, votre candidature ne sera pas prise en compte,

Assurez-vous s'il vous plait de suivre toutes les étapes ci-dessus. 

Il s'agit d'une excellente opportunité avec la possibilité de collaborer dans un environnement dynamique & collaboratif, donc je ne regarderai que les candidats qui veulent vraiment l'opportunité,

Merci à vous!

Job Title: Renewable  : Developing and Implementing a Comprehensive Compensation Structure
Description:
Green Tech United, a leading provider in the renewable energy market, is seeking a highly skilled and experienced HR & Sales Market Manager to help drive the growth of our company. As a contract-to-hire position, the successful candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing a comprehensive compensation structure, employee handbook, and sales structure that supports our mission to democratize transparency in the U.S. solar and renewable energy markets.

Responsibilities:

Design and implement a compensation structure that aligns with industry standards in the renewable energy market
Develop and maintain an updated employee handbook that reflects the company's culture and values
Create and manage a sales structure that maximizes the 1099 nature of our organization
Oversee the management of HR processes and procedures, including employee relations and benefits administration

Requirements:

Job Title: Looking To Hire Social Media Manager
Description:
Social Media Manager  

Are you in Florida? Are you in your element when you’re helping others realize their potential? Can you have an entire conversation in emojis?

  If you answered “YES!” to the questions above, we’d love to have you join our team. 

Yellow Umbrella is looking for a Social Media Manager to help us reach the next generation with positivity, empowerment, and knowledge of modeling. This is an in office position.

Responsibilities 
The Social Media Manager is responsible for:
 • Design and schedule content across all social media platforms.

 • Develop and manage the weekly content schedule for Victory social media platforms. 
• Create incredibly engaging written and visual content. 
• Collaborate with other content creators to support engagement campaigns. 
• Identify and measure key performance metrics to determine success of efforts.
 • Develop and monitor paid advertising campaigns that lead to the conversion of casual social media users to engaged followers and ultimately visitors. 
• Build and coach a social media content creation team. (Only for those looking for a long term position)
• Recruit others with marketing, content creation, and/or public speaking abilities and coordinate with them to serve the social media needs of Yellow Umbrella (only for those looking for a long term position)

Reports To: 
Communications Project Manager  

Skills and Qualifications 
•Can be Entry level, but some experience is a benefit
• Continuously learn new social media trends, tools, and platforms, providing insight to execute new strategies to grow engagement. 
• Strong written, verbal and interpersonal communication skills to create relationships. 
• Strong writing, editing and proofing skills. 
• Ability to problem solve, make independent decisions and be self-motivated. 
• Experience managing social media campaigns. 
• Experience building teams and developing leaders. (Long term position seekers)
• Graphic design and Adobe Photoshop/Illustrator experience (not required but a benefit)

 Hours: 
This position is full-time or part time. Some weekend and evening hours, are required.  

Benefits: 
• Learn what it takes for modeling agencies to succeed and build relationships
• Work with a company that stands for the rights of women, and helps regular every day people do what they always dreamed of
• Have a team of people behind you instead of having to do everything yourself (videographers, writers, project managers, etc.)
• Flexible and remote scheduling available
 • Relaxed, friendly atmosphere 
• Opportunities for professional development

Job Title: Need a good digital marketing person/company to help us with our SaaS
Description:
READ THE ENTIRE JOB POSTING. If you simply write back that you are a Facebook Ads manager... do not apply.

We need someone with vast knowledge of digital marketing for AccountSend.com 

We need someone to help us get the company out there to start generating serious revenue.

We have a small budget for testing... the testing phase must yield tangible results to increase the budget. We do not have $10,000 to spend on Facebook ads to test... I've no interest in that. We've spent $25,000 on Facebook ads and barely broke even The cost per acquisition on Facebook has become outlandishly ridiculously high. So, if you are going to propose Facebook ads.... please do not apply.  We've had 10 other firms try to manage our Facebook Ads account and they all failed. I've heard EVERY strategy in the world... NOTHING works.

We need a strategy that will work, is cheap to test, and can yield results. We have all the data we can use such as email and mobile phones. Again, do not simply write back "we can run an email campaign via mailchimp".... we can do that ourselves... and mailchimp will shut it down immediately

We need a comprehensive cover letter explaining what you actually can do for us with DETAIL.

Please respond with "Yes, I've read the gig". You will not get an interview without writing this.
